entry.title: Representations of field automorphism groups
entry.summary: This is a common introduction to math.RT/0101170, math.RT/0306333, math.RT/0506043, math.RT/0601028. Compared to these references there are new results including (i) a description of a separable closure of an extension of transcendence degree one of an algebraically closed field of positive characteristic; (ii) a "K\"unneth formula" for the products with curves; (iii) the semi-simplicity of the module of regular forms of top degree $\Omega^n_{F/k}$.

entry.title: Every projective variety is a quiver Grassmannian
entry.summary: The claim in the title is proved.

entry.title: Comments on my papers
entry.summary: This document contains comments on some of my papers.

entry.title: SL(2) and z-measures
entry.summary: We give a representation-theoretic proof of the formula for correlation functions of z-measures obtained by Borodin and Olshanski in math.RT/9904010. This paper is historically preceding my paper math.RT/9907127.

entry.title: An exotic nilpotent cone for symplectic group
entry.summary: The contents of this paper is merged into math.RT/0601155. To avoid possible confusion, I withdraw this paper.
entry.arxiv:comment: The contents of this paper is merged into math.RT/0601155. To avoid possible confusion, I withdraw this paper

entry.title: On Shintani zeta functions for GL(2)
entry.summary: In this paper we consider an analogue of the zeta function for not necessarily prehomogeneous representations of GL(2) and compute some of the poles.

entry.title: Prehomogeneous vector spaces and ergodic theory I
entry.summary: This is part one of a series of papers. In this series of papers, we consider problems analogous to the Oppenheim conjecture from the viewpoint of prehomogeneous vector spaces.

entry.title: Prehomogeneous vector spaces, Eisenstein series, and invariant theory
entry.summary: In this paper, we give an introduction to the rationality of the equivariant Morse stratification, and state the author's results on zeta functions of prehomogeneous vector spaces.

entry.title: Prehomogeneous vector spaces and field extensions III
entry.summary: In this paper, we determine the rational orbit decomposition for two prehomogeneous vector spaces associated with the simple group of type G_2.

entry.title: Ratner's theorem and invariant theory
entry.summary: In this note, we consider applications of Ratner's theorem to constructions of families of polynomials with dense values on the set of primitive integer points from the viewpoint of invariant theory.

entry.title: Reciprocity Theorems for Holomorphic Representations of Some Infinite-Dimensional Groups
entry.summary: In this article we prove several reciprocity theorems for some infinite-dimensional dual pairs of representations on Bargmann-Segal-Fock spaces.

entry.title: The c-function for non-compactly causal symmetric spaces
entry.summary: In this paper we prove the product formula for the c-function of non-compactly causal symmetric spaces.

entry.title: A generalization of Hall polynomials to ADE case
entry.summary: Certain computable polynomials are described whose leading coefficients are equal to multiplicities in the tensor product decomposition for representations of a Lie algebra of ADE type.

entry.title: Rationality properties of unipotent representations
entry.summary: We describe those unipotent representations of a finite group of Lie type which are defined over the rational numbers.

entry.title: Derived categories of Schur algebras
entry.summary: We classify the derived tame Schur and infinitesimal Schur algebras and describe indecomposable objects in their derived categories.

entry.title: A twining character formula for Demazure modules (abstract)
entry.summary: We give a twining character formula for Demazure modules.

entry.title: The Strong Macdonald Conjecture
entry.summary: This paper presents our proof of the "strong Macdonald constant term conjecture" of P. Hanlon and B. Feigin.

entry.title: Cuspidal local systems and graded Hecke algebras,III
entry.summary: We prove a strong induction theorem for graded Hecke algebras and we classify the tempered and square integrable representations of such algebras using methods of equivariant homology.

entry.title: Euler-Poincar'e functions
entry.summary: A new construction of Euler-Poincar\'e functions for real reductive groups is given. This construction also works for non-connected groups and representations that do not lift.

entry.title: A construction of finite-dimensional faithful representation of Lie algebra
entry.summary: We give a natural proof of the Ado theorem.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Rend. Circ. Mat. Palermo (2) Suppl. No. 71 (2003), 159-161

entry.title: Hermitian Characteristics of Nilpotent Elements
entry.summary: We define and study several equivariant stratifications of the isotropy and coisotropy representations of a parabolic subgroup in a complex reductive group.

entry.title: Unitary Representations and Theta Correspondence for Type I Classical Groups
entry.summary: In this paper, we prove that theta correspondence preserves unitarity under certain restrictions.

entry.title: Parabolic character sheaves, II
entry.summary: The theory of character sheaves on a reductive group is extended to a class of varieties which includes the strata of the De Concini-Procesi completion of an adjoint group.

entry.title: Affine Krichever-Novikov algebras, their representations and applications
entry.summary: The survey of the current state of the theory of Krichever-Novikov algebras including new results on local central extensions, invariants, representations and casimir operators.

entry.title: Character sheaves on disconnected groups, I
entry.summary: We begin the study of character sheaves on a not necessarily connected reductive group, extending the known theory for connected groups.

entry.title: Character sheaves on disconnected groups, II
entry.summary: The main theme of this paper is establishing the "generalized Springer correspondence" in complete generality that is, for not necessarily connected reductive algebraic groups.

entry.title: An introduction to perverse sheaves
entry.summary: These notes aim to give a first introduction to intersection cohomology and perverse sheaves with applications to representation theory or quantum groups in mind.
entry.arxiv:comment: 39 pages, to appear in Proceedings of the ICRA X

entry.title: Irredundance in Eigenvalue Problems
entry.summary: We show the irredundancy, necessity and sufficiency of inequalities corresponding to intersections whose ``Witten Bundle'' is polyrigid for the product of unitary matrices problem.

entry.title: Character sheaves on disconnected groups, III
entry.summary: We continue the attempt to develop a theory of character sheaves on a not necessarily connected reductive algebraic group. In this paper we introduce and study the generalized Green functions.

entry.title: Character sheaves and generalizations
entry.summary: This paper contains an exposition of the theory of character sheaves for reductive groups and some attempts to extend it to other cases: unipotent groups, reductive groups modulo the unipotent radical of a parabolic.

entry.title: Paires symétriques orthogonales et Isomorphisme de Rouvière
entry.summary: We recover a recent result of A. Alekseev et E. Meinrenken (arXiv: math. RT/0308135) by using our theory of generalized Harish-Chandra homomorphism for symmetric pair.

entry.title: The homology of Heisenberg Lie algebras over fields of characteristic two
entry.summary: The generating function of the Betti numbers of the Heisenberg Lie algebra over a field of characteristic 2 is calculated using discrete Morse theory.

entry.title: A faithful tensor space representation for the blob algebra
entry.summary: We show that a certain tensor space representation of the blob algebra (an affine Hecke algebra quotient) is faithful.

entry.title: Analysis of systematic scan Metropolis algorithms using Iwahori-Hecke algebra techniques
entry.summary: Analysis of systematic scan Metropolis algorithms using Iwahori-Hecke algebra techniques

entry.title: q-rook monoid algebras, Hecke algebras and Schur-Weyl duality
entry.summary: q-rook monoid algebras, Hecke algebras and Schur-Weyl duality

entry.title: Geometric Methods in Representation Theory
entry.summary: These are notes from the mini-course given by W. Schmid in June 2003 in the Brussels PQR2003 Euroschool.
entry.arxiv:comment: Lecture notes taken by M. Libine. 33 pages, 1 figure, LaTeX

entry.title: Character sheaves on disconnected groups, V
entry.summary: We continue the study of character sheaves on a not necessarily connected reductive group. We prove orthogonality formulas for certain characteristic functions.

entry.title: Chevalley restriction theorem for the cyclic quiver
entry.summary: We prove a Chevalley restriction theorem and its double analogue for the cyclic quiver.

entry.title: The Associated Variety of a Poisson Prime Ideal
entry.summary: We show that the associated variety of a Poisson prime ideal of the centre of a symplectic reflection algebra at parameter t=0 is irreducible.

entry.title: Character sheaves on disconnected groups, VI
entry.summary: We define the notion of character sheaf on a possibly disconnected reductive group. We show that the restriction functor carries a character sheaf to a direct sum of character sheaves.

entry.title: A weight multiplicity formula for Demazure modules
entry.summary: We establish a formula for the weight multiplicities of Demazure modules (in particular for highest weight representations) of a complex connected algebraic group in terms of the geometry of its Langlands dual.

entry.title: JMMO Fock space and Geck-Rouquier classification of simple modules for Hecke algebras
entry.summary: This paper is a survey on the representation theory of Hecke algebras, Ariki-Koike algebras and connections with quantum group.

entry.title: Holomorphic extensions of representations: (II) geometry and harmonic analysis
entry.summary: We continue our discussion from part I.

entry.title: Compact groups and their representations
entry.summary: This is an overview article on compact Lie groups and their representations, written for the Encyclopedia of Mathematical Physics to be published by Elsevier.

entry.title: Character sheaves on disconnected groups, IX
entry.summary: We associate a two-sided cell to any (parabolic) character sheaf. We study the interaction of the duality operator for character sheaves and the operation of "twisted induction".

entry.title: Morse theory and tilting sheaves
entry.summary: We give a geometric construction of tilting perverse sheaves using stratified Morse theory, torus actions, and nearby cycles.
entry.arxiv:comment: Dedicated to R. MacPherson on the occasion of his 60th birthday

entry.title: Canonical bases of higher-level q-deformed Fock spaces
entry.summary: We show that the transition matrices between the standard and the canonical bases of infinitely many weight subspaces of the higher-level q-deformed Fock spaces are equal.

entry.title: Algebras of Derived dimension zero
entry.summary: Algebras of derived dimension zero are known.

entry.title: The Langlands functoriality conjecture in the bisemialgebra framework
entry.summary: The Langlands functoriality conjecture envisaged in the bisemialgebra framework is proved to correspond to the nonorthogonal completely reducible cuspidal representations of the bilinear algebraic semigroups.

entry.title: New versions of Schur-Weyl duality
entry.summary: After reviewing classical Schur-Weyl duality, we present some other contexts which enjoy similar features, relating to Brauer algebras and classical groups.

entry.title: Crown theory for the upper halfplane
entry.summary: I exemplify part of my recent work on the upper halfplane.

entry.title: The Self-injective Cluster Tilted Algebras
entry.summary: We are going to determine all the self-injective cluster tilted algebras. All are of finite representation type and special biserial.

entry.title: BGG correspondence for toric complete intersections
entry.summary: We generalize the classical Bernstein-Gelfand-Gelfand correspondence to complete intersections in toric varieties.

entry.title: Pascal's triangle and word bases for blob algebra ideals
entry.summary: We give an elementary proof of isomorphism of the blob (diagram) algebra and the corresponding extended Temperley-Lieb algebra (defined by presentation).

entry.title: $G$-stable pieces and Lusztig's dimension estimates
entry.summary: We use $G$-stable pieces to construct some equidimensional varieties and as a consequence, obtain Lusztig's dimension estimates \cite[section 4]{L2}. This is a generalization of \cite{HL}.

entry.title: Lie admissible algebras are Volichenko
entry.summary: Withdrawn on account of a crucial error in the main theorem

entry.title: Normal form of m-by-n-by-2 matrices for equivalence
entry.summary: We give a canonical form of m-by-2-by-2 spatial matrices for equivalence over any field.

entry.title: The structures of standard (g,K)-modules of SL(3,R)
entry.summary: We describe explicitely the structures of standard $(g,K)$-modules of $SL(3,R)$.

entry.title: On function spaces on symmetric spaces
entry.summary: Let Y=G/H be a semisimple symmetric space. It is shown that the smooth vectors for the regular representation of G on L^p(Y) vanish at infinity.

entry.title: Group Extensions and Automorphism Group Rings
entry.summary: The group ring of the automorphism group of a p-group is studied using the automorphism groups of subgroups and quotient groups of P.

entry.title: Unipotent classes and special Weyl group representations
entry.summary: We show that various invariants of a unipotent conjugacy class in a connected semisimple group can be recovered purely in terms of data involving the Weyl group.

entry.title: On index of certain nilpotent Lie algebras
entry.summary: We introduce the method of calculation of index of Lie algebras that are factors of the unitriangular Lie algebra with respect to ideals spanned by subsets of root vectors.

entry.title: Holomorphie des opérateurs d'entrelacement normalisés à l'aide des paramètres d'Arthur
entry.summary: In this paper we prove holomorphy for certain intertwining operators arising from the theory of Eisenstein series.

entry.title: Moufang symmetry III. Integrability of generalized Lie equations
entry.summary: Integrability of generalized Lie equations of a local analytic Moufang loop is inquired.

entry.title: Moufang symmetry XI. Integrability of generalized Lie equations of continuous Moufang transformations
entry.summary: Integrability of generalized Lie equations of continuous Moufang transformations is inquired.

entry.title: Moufang symmetry VIII. Reconstruction of Moufang loops
entry.summary: Reconstruction theorem for the Moufang loops is proved.

entry.title: Enumeration of ad-nilpotent ideals of parabolic subalgebras for exceptional types
entry.summary: Using GAP4, we determine the number of ad-nilpotent and abelian ideals of a parabolic subalgebra of a simple Lie algebra of exceptional types E, F or G.

entry.title: A generalization of Cachazo-Douglas-Seiberg-Witten conjecture for symmetric spaces
entry.summary: We extend the original Cachazo-Douglas-Seiberg-Witten conjecture for symmetric spaces.

entry.title: Character sheaves on disconnected groups, X
entry.summary: We classify the unipotent character sheaves on a fixed connected component of a reductive algebraic group under a mild hypothesis on the characteristic of the ground field.

entry.title: Piecewise linear parametrization of canonical bases
entry.summary: We extend the known piecewise linear parametrization of the canonical basis of the plus part of an enveloping algebra of type ADE to the nonsimplylaced case.

entry.title: The Adjoint L-function of SU(2,1)
entry.summary: We modify Ginzburg's construction for the Adjoint L function of GL(3) (unfolding and unramified computations only) to accomodate quasisplit unitary groups.

entry.title: Regular functions on covers of nilpotent coadjoint orbits
entry.summary: In this paper I explore the relationship between regular functions associated to local systems on nilpotent orbits and unipotent representations in the complex groups.

entry.title: Unipotent elements in small characteristic, III
entry.summary: We give a uniform description of the decomposition of the unipotent variety of a classical group in arbitrary characteristic into pieces (considered in a non-uniform way in the earlier parts of this paper).

entry.title: 2-Kac-Moody algebras
entry.summary: We construct a 2-category associated with a Kac-Moody algebra and we study its 2-representations. This generalizes earlier work with Chuang for type A. We relate categorifications relying on K_0 properties and 2-representations.

entry.title: Sign conjugacy classes in symmetric groups
entry.summary: A special type of conjugacy classes in symmetric groups is studied and used to answer a question about odd-degree irreducible characters

entry.title: Sur les distributions covariantes dans les algèbres de Lie réductives
entry.summary: We study the possibility of factoring a covariant distribution on reductive Lie algebras as finite sum of products of an invariant distribution by a covariant polynomial.

entry.title: Canonical bases and Khovanov-Lauda algebras
entry.summary: We prove some recent conjectures of Khovanov-Lauda concerning the categorification of one-half of the quantum group associated with a simply laced Cartan datum.

entry.title: On the center of a triangulated category
entry.summary: We discuss some basic properties of the graded center of a triangulated category and compute examples arising in representation theory of finite dimensional algebras.

entry.title: The almost split triangles for perfect complexes over gentle algebras
entry.summary: In the paper we describe the almost split sequences in the homotopy category of perfect complexes over a gentle algebra.

entry.title: Les invariants polynômes de la représentation coadjointe de groupes inhomogènes
entry.summary: Explicit generators are given for the ring of invariant polynomials under the coadjoint representation of certain inhomogeneous groups.

entry.title: Ringel-Hall algebras of cyclic quivers
entry.summary: These are notes from my mini-course at ICRA13, Sao Paulo, 2008

entry.title: Classification of simple q_2-supermodules
entry.summary: We classify all simple supermodules over the queer Lie superalgebra $\mathfrak{q}_{2}$ up to classification of equivalence classes of irreducible elements in a certain Euclidean ring.

entry.title: Littelmann's Refined Demazure Character Formula Revisited
entry.summary: We give a purely combinatorial derivation of Littelmann's refined Demazure character formula
entry.arxiv:comment: Published version, Seminaire Lotharingien de Combinatoire

entry.title: Lectures on Nakajima's Quiver Varieties
entry.summary: This is an expanded version of lectures given at a Summer School "Geometric methods in Representation Theory" (Grenoble, 2008).

entry.title: On the Siegel-Weil Theorem for Loop Groups (II)
entry.summary: We formulate and prove the Siegel-Weil formula for loop groups.

entry.title: The Auslander generators of the exterior algebra in two variables
entry.summary: We compute a complete set of non-isomorphic minimal Auslander generators for the exterior algebra in two variables.

entry.title: The decomposition matrices of the Brauer algebra over the complex field
entry.summary: We determine the decomposition matrices of the Brauer algebra over the complex field.

entry.title: Presenting cyclotomic q-Schur algebras
entry.summary: We give a presentation of cyclotomic q-Schur algebras by generators and defining relations. As an application, we give an algorithm for computing decomposition numbers of cyclotomic q-Schur algebras.

entry.title: Derived dimensions of representation-finite algebras
entry.summary: It is shown that the derived dimension of any representation-finite Artin algebra is at most one.

entry.title: Transfinite normal and composition series of modules
entry.summary: Normal and composition series of modules enumerated by ordinal numbers are studied. The Jordan-Holder theorem for them is discussed.

entry.title: Semi-invariants of 2-representations of quivers
entry.summary: In this work we obtain a version of the Procesi-Rasmyslov Theorem for the algebra of semi-invariants of representations of an arbitrary quiver with dimension vector (2,2,...,2).

entry.title: Classification of simple weight modules over affine Lie algebras
entry.summary: All simple weight modules with finite dimensional weight spaces over affine Lie algebras are classified.

entry.title: On a construction of the basic spin representations of symmetric groups
entry.summary: We present an inductive method for constructing the basic spin representations of the double covers of the symmetric groups over fields of any characteristic.

entry.title: Parabolic character sheaves, III
entry.summary: We define character sheaves on an ind-variety of the form G((t))/U_P where G((t)) is a loop group and U_P is the prounipotent radical of a parahoric subgroup P of G((t)).

entry.title: Double affine Hecke algebras and affine flag manifolds, I
entry.summary: This lecture reviews the classification of simple modules of double affine Hecke algebras via the K-theory of Steinberg varieties of affine type

entry.title: Some remarks on Nakajima's quiver varieties of type A
entry.summary: We try to clarify the relations between quiver varieties of type A and Kraft-Pocesi proof of normality of nilpotent conjugacy classes closures.

entry.title: A general tensor product theorem
entry.summary: We show that every admissible irreducible representation of a product of two locally compact groups is a tensor product of admissible irreducible representations of the factors.

entry.title: Locally simple subalgebras of diagonal Lie algebras
entry.summary: We describe, up to isomorphism, all locally simple subalgebras of any diagonal locally simple Lie algebra.

entry.title: Gröbner basis and Anick's resolution for U_{F_2}(sl^+_3)
entry.summary: We compute three first steps of a minimal projective resolution for the trivial module over U_{F_2}(sl^+_3).

entry.title: A remark on the geometric Jacquet functor
entry.summary: We give an action of $N$ on the geometric Jacquet functor defined by Emerton-Nadler-Vilonen.

entry.title: The complex crown for homogeneous harmonic spaces
entry.summary: A theory of holomorphic extension of eigenfunctions on homogeneous harmonic spaces is developed.

entry.title: The index of centralizers of elements of reductive Lie algebras
entry.summary: same as arXiv:0904.1778

entry.title: Dirac cohomology and unipotent representations of complex groups
entry.summary: This paper studies unitary representations with Dirac cohomology for complex groups, in particular relations to unipotent representations

entry.title: Toeplitz Operators in Hilbert Space over Graphs
entry.summary: In this paper, we consider the relation between Toeplitz operators and elements in von Neumann algebras generated by certain graph groupoids.

entry.title: On isotypies between Galois conjugate blocks
entry.summary: We show that between any pair of Galois conjugate blocks of finite group algebras, there exists an isotypy with all signs positive.

entry.title: Basic Orders for Defect Two Blocks of $\Z_p\Sym_n$
entry.summary: We show how basic orders for defect two blocks of symmetric groups over the ring of $p$-adic integers can be constructed by purely combinatorial means.

entry.title: Denominator identity for affine Lie superalgebras with zero dual Coxeter number
entry.summary: We prove a denominator identity for non-twisted affine Lie superalgebras with zero dual Coxeter number.

entry.title: On the cleanness of cuspidal character sheaves
entry.summary: We prove the cleanness of cuspidal character sheaves in the few cases where it was previously unknown.

entry.title: Total positivity criteria for partial flag varieties
entry.summary: We prove a new family of total positivity criteria for partial flag varieties for simply-connected complex algebraic group in the simply laced case.

entry.title: Notes on MVW-extensions
entry.summary: We review certain basic geometric and analytic results concerning MVW-extensions of classical groups, following Moeglin-Vigneras-Waldspurger. The related results for Jacobi groups, metaplectic groups, and special orthogonal groups are also included.

entry.title: A characteristic-free decomposition of tensor space as a Brauer algebra module
entry.summary: We obtain a characteristic-free decomposition of tensor space, regarded as a module for the Brauer centralizer algebra.

entry.title: A particular case of the Level increasing Conjecture for Type A fusion algebras
entry.summary: A particular case of the level increasing conjecture for type A fusion coefficientes is proved for when one the weights is a multiple of the first fundamental weight.

entry.title: Hochschild cohomology of $GL_2(\bar{\mathbb{F}}_p)$
entry.summary: We compute the Hochschild cohomology algebra of $GL_2$ over an algebraically closed field of characteristic $p>2$.

entry.title: Lie superalgebras and some characters of $S_n$
entry.summary: We prove a formula for $S_n$ characters which are indexed by the partitions in the $(k,\ell)$ hook. The proof applies a combinatorial part of the theory of Lie superalgebras.

entry.title: Primitive ideals in W-algebras of type A
entry.summary: In this note we classify the primitive ideals in finite W-algebras of type A.

entry.title: Super cocommutative Hopf algebras of finite representation type
entry.summary: In this paper, we give the classification of finite supergroup schemes of finite representation type. Moreover, their Auslander-Reiten quivers are determined.

entry.title: Jacquet functor and De Concini-Procesi compactification
entry.summary: We give a geometric realization of the Jacquet functor using a deformation of De Concini-Procesi compactification.

entry.title: Clebsch-Gordan series, the inverse of a Cartan matrix and $η$-invariants
entry.summary: We prove some formulas relating the inverse of a Cartan matrix with algebraic and geometric invariants of finite group representations.

entry.title: A Noether-Deuring theorem for derived categories
entry.summary: We prove a Noether-Deuring theorem for the derived category of bounded complexes of modules over a Noetherian algebra.

entry.title: Quiver Hecke algebras and 2-Lie algebras
entry.summary: This text provides an introduction and complements to some basic constructions and results in 2-representation theory of Kac-Moody algebras.

entry.title: Ideals in Deligne's category Rep(GL_δ)
entry.summary: We give a classification of ideals in Rep(GL_\delta) for arbitrary \delta.

entry.title: Some applications of augmentation quotients
entry.summary: We give some applications of augmentation quotients of free group rings in group theory.

entry.title: On the Dimensions of Path Algebras
entry.summary: In this paper we study the representation dimension as well as the derived dimension of the path algebra of an artin algebra over a finite and acyclic quiver.

entry.title: Groebner basis and the Anick resolution for U_K(sl_3^+)
entry.summary: We compute three first steps of a minimal projective resolution for the trivial module over U_K(sl_3^+).
entry.arxiv:comment: 23p. arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:1003.2197

entry.title: Irreducible representations of the exceptional cheng-kac superalgebra
entry.summary: We classify all conformal irreducible modules of finite type over the Cheng Kac superalgebra CK(6).

entry.title: Infinitesimal semisimple symplectic extrinsic symmetric spaces
entry.summary: We study infinitesimal semi-simple extrinsic symmetric spaces and give a classification in the symplectic case.

entry.title: A remark on representations of infinite symmetric groups
entry.summary: We simplify construction of Thoma representations of an infinite symmetric group

entry.title: Module Structure on Invariant Jacobians
entry.summary: In this paper we show that a conjecture of Stephen Yau on highest weights of invariant Jacobians is true for arbitrary connected semisimple algebraic groups.

entry.title: Hochschild cohomology of the cluster-tilted algebras of finite representation type
entry.summary: We compute the Hochschild cohomology groups of the cluster-tilted algebras of finite representation type.

entry.title: Existence of cuspidal representations of p-adic reductive groups
entry.summary: We prove that any reductive group G over a non-Archimedean local field has a cuspidal complex representation.

entry.title: Hochschild cohomology of gentle algebras
entry.summary: We compute the Hochschild cohomology groups of gentle algebras and show that they are determined by the derived invariant introduced by Avella-Alaminos and Geiss.

entry.title: Vogan diagrams of Affine Kac-Moody Superalgebras
entry.summary: This article classifies the Vogan diagram of the affine untwisted Kac Moody superalgebras.

entry.title: Algebras of finite global dimension
entry.summary: Let $\Lambda$ be a finite dimensional algebra over an algebraically closed field $k$. We survey some results on algebras of finite global dimension and address some open problems.

entry.title: A remark on braid group actions on coherent sheaves
entry.summary: A construction of braid group actions on coherent sheaves using mixed Hodge modules and some well known constructions from geometric representation theory is given.

entry.title: Tate duality and transfer in Hochschild cohomology
entry.summary: We show that dualising transfer maps in Hochschild cohomology of symmetric algebras commutes with Tate duality. This extends a well-known result in group cohomology.

entry.title: Field of U-invariants of adjoint representation of the group GL(n,K)
entry.summary: We obtain system of generators of the field of U-invariants of ajoint representation of the group GL(n,K).

entry.title: The orbit method for unipotent groups over finite field
entry.summary: We apply the orbit method to obtain formula for multiplicities of certain representations of unipotent groups over the finite field.

entry.title: Semi-invariants for concealed-canonical algebras
entry.summary: In the paper is we generalize known descriptions of rings of semi-invariants for regular modules over Euclidean and canonical algebras to arbitrary concealed-canonical algebras.

entry.title: On Local and Global Conjugacy
entry.summary: In this note we discuss and classify LFMO-spcial representations, for which under certain functoriality, it gives the instance of failure of multiplicity one.

entry.title: Invariant functionals and Zamolodchikovs' integral
entry.summary: We calculate a Zamolodchikovs' triple integral by the Bernstein-Reznikov method.

entry.title: Extensions of trivial inertial blocks
entry.summary: A false application of Proposition 4.10 causes a mistake in the proof of Corollary 4.11
entry.arxiv:comment: There is an error in Line -4, Page 14

entry.title: The Murnaghan-Nakayama rule and some virtual S_n characters
entry.summary: We construct certain virtual characters for the symmetric groups, then compute a formula which calculates the values of these virtual characters.

entry.title: The nonvanishing hypothesis at infinity for Rankin-Selberg convolutions
entry.summary: We prove the nonvanishing hypothesis at infinity for Rankin-Selberg convolutions for $\GL(n)\times \GL(n-1)$.

entry.title: Quiver Schur algebras and Koszul duality
entry.summary: We prove that the category of graded finitely generated representations of the the cyclotomic quiver Schur algebra is a Koszul category.

entry.title: Modular reduction of the Steinberg lattice of the general linear group
entry.summary: The modular reduction of the Steinberg lattice of the general linear group is studied

entry.title: Dual characters of the Hecke algebra and twisted Markov traces
entry.summary: Twisted Markov traces and irreducible characters of the Hecke algebra are dual.

entry.title: A Generalization of Lie's Theorem
entry.summary: We prove that in a locally finite dimensional Lie algebra L, any maximal, locally solvable subalgebra (Borel subalgebra) is the stabilizer of a maximal, generalized flag in an integrable, faithful module over L.

entry.title: Algebraic Morse theory and homological perturbation theory
entry.summary: We show that the main result of algebraic Morse theory can be obtained as a consequence of the perturbation lemma of Brown and Gugenheim.

entry.title: Schur-Weyl duality for the unitary groups of $II_1$-factors
entry.summary: We obtain the analogue of Schur-Weyl duality for the unitary group of an arbitrary ${\rm II}_1$-factor

entry.title: Modular equivariant formality
entry.summary: Let $X$ be a partial flag variety, equipped with the Borel action by multiplication. We give a criterion for the equivariant derived category with modular coefficients to be formal.

entry.title: B(G) for all local and global fields
entry.summary: Generalizing earlier results concerning p-adic fields, this paper develops a theory of B(G) for all local and global fields.

entry.title: Essén Lectures: Representation Theory of Symmetric Groups
entry.summary: These are partial lecture notes from the fifteen Ess\'en Lectures for graduate students at Uppsala University given (in four days!) in June 2013.

entry.title: Abelian localization for cyclotomic Cherednik algebras
entry.summary: In this paper we prove the abelian localization theorem for modules over cyclotomic Rational Cherednik algebras.

entry.title: The Krull-Gabriel dimension of discrete derived categories
entry.summary: We compute the Krull-Gabriel dimension of the category of perfect complexes for finite dimensional algebras which are derived discrete.

entry.title: Effective Representations of Path Semigroups
entry.summary: We give a formula which determines the minimal effective dimensions of path semigroups and truncated path semigroups over an uncountable field of characteristic zero.

entry.title: Splitting Metaplectic Subgroups
entry.summary: The purpose of this note is to provide a readable and comprehensive proof of one result about splitting Metaplectic subgroups.

entry.title: Notes on representations of finite groups of Lie type
entry.summary: These are the notes of some lectures given by the author for a workshop held at TIFR, Mumbai in December, 2011, giving an exposition of the Deligne-Lusztig theory.

entry.title: A Product Theorem in simple Lie groups
entry.summary: We prove a discretized Product Theorem for general simple Lie groups, in the spirit of Bourgain's Discretized Sum-Product Theorem.

entry.title: Exceptional representations of Weyl groups
entry.summary: We examine various consequences of the existence of exceptional representations of an irreducible Weyl group. (These are notes from a talk in the MIT Lie groups seminar.)

entry.title: Embeddings of representations
entry.summary: We derive "numerical" criteria for the existence of embeddings of representations of finite dimensional algebras.

entry.title: Unramified Whittaker Functions on p-adic Loop Groups
entry.summary: We define unramified Whittaker functions on the p-adic points of an affine Kac-Moody group, and establish an analogue of the Casselman-Shalika formula for these functions.

entry.title: The local theta representation I
entry.summary: In this article, a kind of complex smooth representation of a direct product of two locally profinite groups was introduced and two results about such representation were proved.

entry.title: Algebraic and geometric methods in representation theory
entry.summary: This is an expanded version of my Shaw Prize Lecture delivered at the Chinese University of Hong Kong.

entry.title: A direct approach to the rational normal form
entry.summary: We give a short constructive proof for the existence and uniqueness of the rational normal form of a quadratic matrix.

entry.title: On the definition of Kac-Moody 2-category
entry.summary: We show that the Kac-Moody 2-categories defined by Rouquier and by Khovanov and Lauda are the same.

entry.title: Koszul Duality and Soergel Bimodules for Dihedral Groups
entry.summary: We show that the endomorphism ring of the projective generator in the category of Soergel modules (for dihedral groups) is Koszul self-dual.

entry.title: Hochschild cohomology of $U(\mathfrak{sl}_2(k))$
entry.summary: We calculate the Hochschild cohomology of $U(\mathfrak{sl}_2(k))$, where $k$ is a field of characteristic $p>2$.

entry.title: Clifford theory for infinite dimensional modules
entry.summary: Clifford theory of possibly infinite dimensional modules is studied

entry.title: A Cauchy-Schwarz inequality for representations of SU(2)
entry.summary: Motivated by some applications to calculating order of poles of certain (local or global) $L$-functions, the author considers a Cauchy-Schwarz type inequality for representations of SU(2).

entry.title: Hodge theory and unitary representations, in the example of $\mathrm{SL}(2,\mathbb{R})$
entry.summary: We describe our conjecture about the irreducible unitary representations of reductive Lie groups, in the special case of $\mathrm{SL}(2,\mathbb{R})$.

entry.title: Singular equivalence and the (Fg) condition
entry.summary: We show that singular equivalences of Morita type with level between finite-dimensional Gorenstein algebras over a field preserve the (Fg) condition.

entry.title: Interval Decomposition of Infinite Zigzag Persistence Modules
entry.summary: We show that every infinite zigzag persistence module decomposes into a direct sum of interval persistence modules.

entry.title: On representations of Cartan map Lie superalgebras
entry.summary: This paper describes finite dimensionall irreducible representations of both twisted and untwisted Cartan map Lie superalgebras.

entry.title: Methods for Parametrizing Varieties of Lie Algebras
entry.summary: We describe how to smoothly parametrize certain families of nilpotent Lie algebras.

entry.title: The derived equivalence classification of gentle two-cycle algebras
entry.summary: We complete the derived equivalence classification of the gentle two-cycle algebras initiated in earlier papers by Avella-Alaminos and Bobinski-Malicki.

entry.title: The growth of Temperley-Lieb type algebras
entry.summary: This article examines the growth of generalized algebras of type Temperley-Lieb $ TL _ {\ Gamma, \ tau}. $ Studied them dimension or if the algebra of infinite growth.

entry.title: Generalized Springer theory and weight functions
entry.summary: We show that each Weyl group which enters in the generalized Springer correspondence carries a natural weight function.

entry.title: Stability property of multiplicities of group representations
entry.summary: This paper is dedicated to the study of the stability of multiplicities of group representations.

entry.title: Extending and quantising the Vogel plane
entry.summary: After introducing the Vogel plane we give the quantisation. Then we extend the Vogel plane to include certain symmetric spaces and give the quantisation of this extension.

entry.title: Koszul Duality for Quasi-split Real Groups
entry.summary: We establish a categorical version of Vogan duality for quasi-split real groups. This proves a conjecture of Soergel in the quasi-split case.

entry.title: Local-global conjectures in the representation theory of finite groups
entry.summary: We give a survey of recent developments in the investigation of the various local-global conjectures for representations of finite groups.

entry.title: Genericity under parahoric restriction
entry.summary: We study the preservation of genericity under parahoric restriction of depth zero representations.

entry.title: Springer correspondence for exceptional Lie algebras and their duals in small characteristic
entry.summary: We describe the Springer correspondence explicitly for exceptional Lie algebras of type $G_2$ and $F_4$ and their duals in bad characteristics, i.e. in characteristics 2 and 3.

entry.title: Enumerating representations of general unitary groups over principal ideal rings of length 2
entry.summary: We enumerate the number of complex irreducible representations of each degree of general unitary groups of degree 4 over principal ideal rings of length 2.

entry.title: On infinite groups admitting a faithful irreducible representation
entry.summary: Necessary and sufficient conditions for a group to possess a faithful irreducible representation are investigated

entry.title: The canonical basis of the quantum adjoint representation
entry.summary: We identify the canonical basis of the quantum adjoint representation of a quantized enveloping algebra with a basis that we defined before the theory of canonical bases was available.

entry.title: Structure constants of pseudo $H$-type algebras in some integral bases
entry.summary: We present the structural constants of low dimensional pseudo $H$-type algebras.

entry.title: On the simplicity of induced modules for reductive Lie algebras. II
entry.summary: A sufficient condition for the simplicity of induced modules of reductive Lie algebras is given.

entry.title: Skew cell modules for diagram algebras
entry.summary: We provide an explicit construction of skew cell modules for diagram algebras.

entry.title: Cocenters of Hecke-Clifford and spin Hecke algebras
entry.summary: We determine a basis of the cocenter (i.e., the zeroth Hochschild homology) of the degenerate affine Hecke-Clifford and spin Hecke algebras in classical types.

entry.title: On good Z-gradings of basic Lie superalgebras
entry.summary: We discuss the classification of good Z-gradings of basic Lie superalgebras. This problem arose in connection to W-algebras, where good Z-gradings play a role in their construction.

entry.title: Clifford theory on rational Cherednik algebras of imprimitive groups
entry.summary: Ram and Rammage have introduced an automorphism and Clifford theory on affine Hecke algebras. Here we will extend them to cyclotomic Hecke algebras and rational Cherednik algebras.

entry.title: On the generalized Springer correspondence
entry.summary: We close a gap in the explicit determination of the generalized Springer correspondence for a connected reductive group in good characteristic.

entry.title: A remark about 6j symbols and young semi-normal form
entry.summary: We compute some 6j symbols in the category of polynomial representations of $GL(\infty)$.

entry.title: Parabolic inductions for pro-$p$-Iwahori Hecke algebras
entry.summary: We give some properties of parabolic inductions and their adjoint functors for pro-$p$-Iwahori Hecke algebras.

entry.title: Stability of Springer representations for type $A$
entry.summary: We prove certain stability properties of Springer representations for type $A$.

entry.title: Construction of Tame Types
entry.summary: We construct tame types for connected reductive p-adic groups. We also discuss their exhaustion and equivalence.
entry.arxiv:comment: to appear in a volume in honor of Roger Howe

entry.title: Finite Commutative Semihypergroups Built From Groups
entry.summary: Necessary and sufficient conditions for finite commutative semihypergroups to be built from abelian groups of the same order are established.

entry.title: Remarks on the extended Brauer quotient
entry.summary: We point out the graded structure of the extended Brauer quotient an interior $G$-algebra.

entry.title: Finite Semihypergroups Built From Groups
entry.summary: Necessary and sufficient conditions for finite semihypergroups to be built from groups of the same order are established

entry.title: Injective Restriction of Brauer Characters
entry.summary: If G is a finite group and H is a subgroup of G, we characterize when restriction of Brauer characters from G to H is injective.

entry.title: Extension between simple modules of pro-$p$-Iwahori Hecke algebras
entry.summary: We calculate the extension groups between simple modules of pro-$p$-Iwahori Hecke algebras.
entry.arxiv:comment: 25 pages. arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:1704.00407

entry.title: Matrices for the Weil representation
entry.summary: These notes contain a revisit to the matrix construction of the Weil representation by the author in the Journal of Algebra in 1972.

entry.title: A Fourier transform for the quantum Toda lattice
entry.summary: We introduce an algebraic Fourier transform for the quantum Toda lattice.

entry.title: Lifting endo-$p$-permutation modules
entry.summary: We prove that all endo-$p$-permutation modules for a finite group are liftable from characteristic $p>0$ to characteristic $0$.

entry.title: Auslander's defect formula and a commutative triangle in an exact category
entry.summary: We prove the Auslander's defect formula in an exact category, and obtain a commutative triangle involving the Auslander bijections and the generalized Auslander-Reiten duality.

entry.title: Equivariant $\mathcal{D}$-modules on rigid analytic spaces
entry.summary: We define coadmissible equivariant $\mathcal{D}$-modules on smooth rigid analytic spaces and relate them to admissible locally analytic representations of semisimple $p$-adic Lie groups.

entry.title: On the cohomology of Calogero-Moser spaces
entry.summary: We compute the equivariant cohomology of smooth Calogero-Moser spaces and some associated symplectic resolutions of symplectic quotient singularities.

entry.title: Ringel-Hall algebra construction of quantum Borcherds-Bozec algebras
entry.summary: We give the Ringel-Hall algebra construction of the positive half of quantum Borcherds-Bozec algebras as the generic composition algebras of quivers with loops.

entry.title: Grothendieck groups and tilting objects
entry.summary: Let C be a connected noetherian hereditary abelian Ext-finite category with Serre functor over an algebraically closed field k, with finite dimensional homomorphism and extension spaces. Using the classification of such categories from math.RT/9911242, we prove that if C has some object of infinite length, then the Grothendieck group of C is finitely generated if and only if C has a tilting object.

entry.title: On quantum ergodicity for vector bundles
entry.summary: In the present paper we develop a framework in which questions of quantum ergodicity for operators acting on sections of hermitian vector bundles over Riemannian manifolds can be studied. We are particularly interested in the case of locally symmetric spaces. For locally symmetric spaces, we extend the recent construction of Silberman and Venkatesh (math.RT/0407413) of representation theoretic lifts to vector bundles.

entry.title: Andersen Filtration and Hard Lefschetz
entry.summary: On the space of homomorphisms from a Verma module to an indecomposable tilting module of the BGG-category O we define a natural filtration following Andersen and establish a formula expressing the dimensions of the filtration steps in terms of coefficients of Kazhdan-Lusztig polynomials.
entry.arxiv:comment: English version of math.RT/0604589, v3 revised translation

entry.title: Notes sur l'indice des algèbres de Lie (II)
entry.summary: This text is a continuation to "Notes sur l'indice des alg\`ebres de Lie (I)", math.RT/0605499 ----- Ce texte est une suite \`a : "Notes sur l'indice des alg\`ebres de Lie (I)".
entry.arxiv:comment: Article is written in french. The author's name has been corrected

entry.title: Perverse sheaves on affine flags and nilpotent cone of the Langlands dual group
entry.summary: In math.RT/0201073 we constructed an equivalence between the derived category of equivariant coherent sheaves on the cotangent bundle to the flag variety of a simple algebraic group and a (quotient of) the category of constructible sheaves on the affine flag variety of the Langlands dual group. Below we prove certain properties of this equivalence; provide a similar ``Langlands dual'' description for the category of equivariant coherent sheaves on the nilpotent cone; and deduce some conjectures by Lusztig and Ostrik.
entry.arxiv:comment: This is a continuation of math.RT/0201073. 13 pages; some corrections

entry.title: Positivity and canonical bases in rank 2 cluster algebras of finite and affine types
entry.summary: The main motivation for the study of cluster algebras initiated in math.RT/0104151, math.RA/0208229 and math.RT/0305434 was to design an algebraic framework for understanding total positivity and canonical bases in semisimple algebraic groups. In this paper, we introduce and explicitly construct the canonical basis for a special family of cluster algebras of rank 2.
entry.arxiv:comment: 27 pages; A brief introduction added, references updated and expanded, the final version to appear in Moscow Mathematical Journal

entry.title: Vector invariants of a class of pseudo-reflection groups and multisymmetric syzygies
entry.summary: First and second fundamental theorems are given for polynomial invariants of a class of pseudo-reflection groups (including the Weyl groups of type $B_n$), under the assumption that the order of the group is invertible in the base field. Special case of the result is a finite presentation of the algebra of multisymmetric polynomials. Reducedness of the invariant commuting scheme is proved as a by-product. The algebra of multisymmetric polynomials over an arbitrary base ring is revisited.
entry.arxiv:comment: Joining the contents of math.RT/0602303v3 and math.RT/0611430v1 plus some additional material

entry.title: Realising higher cluster categories of Dynkin type as stable module categories
entry.summary: We show that the stable module categories of certain selfinjective algebras of finite representation type having tree class A_n, D_n, E_6, E_7 or E_8 are triangulated equivalent to u-cluster categories of the corresponding Dynkin type. The proof relies on the 'Morita' theorem for u-cluster categories by Keller and Reiten, along with the recent computation of Calabi-Yau dimensions of stable module categories by Dugas.
entry.arxiv:comment: 26 pages. This paper supersedes withdrawn preprints math.RT/0610728 and math.RT/0612451 which based the computation of Calabi-Yau dimensions on an erroneous result. The problem is circumvented here by using a recent paper of Alex Dugas

entry.title: The projective cover of the trivial representation for a finite group of Lie type in defining characteristic
entry.summary: We give a lower bound of the Loewy length of the projective cover of the trivial module for the group algebra $kG$ of a finite group $G$ of Lie type defined over a finite field of odd characteristic $p$, where $k$ is an arbitrary field of characteristic $p$; the proof uses Auslander-Reiten theory.
entry.arxiv:comment: 12 pages; in v1 we were pointing out an error in arXiv:1508.01627v3 [math.RT]; this version (v2) now takes the corrigendum in arXiv:1508.01627v4 [math.RT] into account

entry.title: On the Shintani zeta function for the space of binary tri-Hermitian forms
entry.summary: In this paper, we consider the most non-split parabolic D_4 type prehomogeneous vector space. The vector space is an analogue of the space of Hermitian forms. We determine the principal part of the zeta function.

entry.title: Harmonic Analysis on the Finite Twisted Poincaré Upper Half Plane
entry.summary: We prove that the induced representation from a non trivial character of the Coxeter torus of GL$(2,F)$, for a finite field $F$, is multiplicity-free; we give an explicit description of the corresponding (twisted) spherical functions and a version of the Heisenberg Uncertainty Principle.

entry.title: Correction to "Zero-entropy affine maps on homogeneous spaces
entry.summary: Proposition~6.4 of the author's paper {\origpaper} is incorrect. This invalid proposition was used in the proof of Corollary~6.5, so we provide a new proof of the latter result.

entry.title: A remark on the regularity of prehomogeneous vector spaces
entry.summary: In this note, we prove that if $(G,V)$ is a prehomogeneous vector space over any field $k$ such that the stabilizer of a generic point is reductive, the set of semi-stable points is a single orbit over the separable closure of $k$.

entry.title: Double Bruhat cells and total positivity
entry.summary: We study intersections of opposite Bruhat cells in a semisimple complex Lie group, and associated totally nonnegative varieties.
entry.arxiv:comment: 45 pages, 8 figures; for color version, see http://www-math.mit.edu/~fomin/papers.html

entry.title: Orthogonal polynomials and Lie superalgebras
entry.summary: For the orthogonal Lie algebra O(2n+1), in addition to the conventional set of orthogonal polynomials, another set is produced with the help of the Lie superalgebra OSP(1|2n). Difficulties related with expression of Dyson's constant for the Lie superalgebras are discussed.

entry.title: On representations of affine Temperley-Lieb algebras, II
entry.summary: We study some non-semisimple representations of affine Temperley--Lieb algebras and related cellular algebras. In particular, we classify extensions between simple standard modules. Moreover, we construct a completion which is an infinite dimensional cellular algebra.

entry.title: Kazhdan-Lusztig conjecture for symmetrizable Kac-Moody Lie algebras. III --Positive rational case--
entry.summary: In this paper we prove the Kazhdan-Lusztig type character formula for irreducible highest weight modules with positive rational highest weights over symmetrizable Kac-Moody Lie algebras.

entry.title: NilCoxeter algebras categorify the Weyl algebra
entry.summary: We show that induction and restriction functors for inclusions of nilCoxeter algebras provide a categorical realization of the algebra of polynomial differential operators in one variable.

entry.title: Dimension of a minimal nilpotent orbit
entry.summary: We show that the dimension of the minimal nilpotent coadjoint orbit for a complex simple Lie algebra is equal to twice the dual Coxeter number minus two.

entry.title: Parabolic Kazhdan-Lusztig polynomials and Schubert varieties
entry.summary: We shall give a description of the intersection cohomology groups of the Schubert varieties in partial flag manifolds over symmetrizable Kac-Moody Lie algebras in terms of parabolic Kazhdan-Lusztig polynomials introduced by Deodhar.

entry.title: Nearly Holomorphic Functions and Relative Discrete Series of Weighted $L^2$-Spaces on Bounded Symmetric Domains
entry.summary: We realize the relative discrete series of a weighted $L^2$-space on a bounded symmetric doamin as kernels of invariant Cauchy-Riemann operator, and thus as the spaces of nearly holomorphic functions.

entry.title: Some properties of index of Lie algebras
entry.summary: In this paper we prove several theorems about the behavior of index of Lie algebras derived from associative algebras under tensor products of underlying associative algebras.

entry.title: Motivic zeta functions of infinite dimensional Lie algebras
entry.summary: We associate motivic zeta functions to a large class of infinite dimensional Lie algebras

entry.title: Formal dimension for semisimple symmetric spaces
entry.summary: In this paper we generalize Harish Chandra's formula for the formal dimension of a representation of the holomorphic discrete series of a hermitian Lie group $G$ to semisimple symmetric spaces $G/H$.

entry.title: On Characters of Weyl Groups
entry.summary: In this note a combinatorial formula related to the symmetric group is generalized to an arbitrary finite Weyl group.
entry.arxiv:comment: 5 pages, to appear in Discrete Mathematics

entry.title: Unitary spherical highest weight representations
entry.summary: In this paper we give a classification of the $H$-spherical unitary highest weight representations of a hermitian Lie group $G$.

entry.title: Projectivity of modules for infinitesimal unipotent group schemes
entry.summary: In this paper, it is shown that the projectivity of a rational module for an infinitesimal unipotent group scheme over an algebraically closed field of positive characteristic can be detected on a family of closed subgroups.

entry.title: Cluster algebras I: Foundations
entry.summary: In an attempt to create an algebraic framework for dual canonical bases and total positivity in semisimple groups, we initiate the study of a new class of commutative algebras.

entry.title: Lusztig's Canonical Quotient and Generalized Duality
entry.summary: We present a new characterization of Lusztig's canonical quotient group. We also define a duality map: to a pair consisting of a nilpotent orbit and a conjugacy class in its fundamental group, the map assigns a nilpotent orbit in the Langlands dual Lie algebra.

entry.title: Adapted algebras for the Berenstein-Zelevinsky conjecture
entry.summary: We study algebras on which the Berenstein-Zelevinsky conjecture is true. In particular, we prove that this conjecture is true "up to localization".

entry.title: The topological trace formula
entry.summary: The Lefschetz formula for the action of a Hecke correspondence on the weighted cohomology of a locally symmetric space is derived. It is also proven that each Hecke correspondence on the reductive Borel-Serre compactification of the locally symmetric space is weakly hyperbolic.

entry.title: The Weyl Algebra and the Structure of Lie Superalgebras of Riemannian Type
entry.summary: A Lie superalgebrea of Riemannian type leads to a representation of a quadratic Lie algebra into a Weyl algebra. A necessary and sufficient condition that such a representation leads to a Lie superalgebra of Riemannian type is that the Casimir maps to a constant.

entry.title: Lectures on affine Hecke algebras with unequal parameters
entry.summary: These are notes for lectures given at MIT in 1999 (Fall). They contain a discussion of affine Hecke algebras with possibly unequal parameters including a theory of cells and a partly conjectural theory of J-rings.

entry.title: Invariant Stein domains in Stein symmetric spaces and a non-linear complex convexity theorem
entry.summary: We prove a complex version of Kostant's non-linear convexity theorem. Applications to the construction of G-invariant Grauert tubes of non-compact Riemannian symmetric G/K spaces are given.

entry.title: Representations de dimension finie de l'algebre de Cherednik rationnelle
entry.summary: On donne une condition necessaire et suffisante pour l'existence de modules de dimension finie sur l'algebre de Cherednik rationnelle associee a un systeme de racines.
entry.arxiv:comment: french, 14 pages, typos corrected and examples added

entry.title: Jack polynomials for the $BC_n$ root system and generalized spherical functions
entry.summary: We give a construction for three parameter family of Jack polynolials for the root system $BC_n$ through the generalized spherical functions on the symmetric space $GL(m+n)/GL(m)\times GL(n)$.

entry.title: The representation theory of the Ariki-Koike and cyclotomic q-Schur algebras
entry.summary: This article is a comprehensive review of the representation theory of the Ariki-Koike algebras and the cyclotomic Schur algebras.

entry.title: Smooth quiver quotient varieties
entry.summary: In this paper we classify all the quivers and corresponding dimension vectors having a smooth space of semisimple representation classes. The result is that these quiver settings can be reduced via some specific reduction steps to 3 simple types.

entry.title: Generalized blob algebras and alcove geometry
Normality of nilpotent varieties in $E_6$
entry.summary: We determine which nilpotent orbits in $E_6$ have normal closure and which do not. We also verify a conjecture about small representations in rings of functions on nilpotent orbit covers for type $E_6$.

entry.title: The norm of a relation, separating functions and representations of marked quivers
entry.summary: Numerical functions, which characterize Dynkin schemes, Coxeter graphs and tame marked quivers, are considered.

entry.title: Induced and simple modules of double affine Hecke algebras
entry.summary: We classify the simple integrable modules of double affine Hecke algebras via perverse sheaves. We get also some estimate for the Jordan-Holder multiplicities of induced modules.

entry.title: Hochschild and cyclic homology of a family of Auslander algebras
entry.summary: In this paper, we compute the Hochschild and cyclic homologies of the Auslander algebras of the Taft algebras. We also describe the first Chern character for the Taft algebras and for their Auslander algebras.

entry.title: Dirac Cohomology for the Cubic Dirac Operator
entry.summary: Using the cubic Dirac operator and an extended notion of Dirac cohomology we generalize results of Huang-Pandzic, which appeared in JAMS (Sept. 6, 2001 electronic) on a conjecture of D. Vogan

entry.title: Classification of two-orbit varieties
entry.summary: A two-orbit variety is a normal complete complex algebraic variety on which a reductive complex algebraic group acts with exactly two orbits. The aim of this paper is to give the classification of all two-orbit varieties and to prove Luna's conjecture, namely that two-orbit varieties are spherical.

entry.title: Stable endomorphism algebras of modules over special biserial algebras
entry.summary: We prove that the stable endomorphism algebra of a module without self-extensions over a special biserial algebra is a gentle algebra. In particular, it is again special biserial. As a consequence, any algebra which is derived equivalent to a gentle algebra is gentle.

entry.title: Poisson geometry and the Kashiwara-Vergne conjecture
entry.summary: We give a Poisson-geometric proof of the Kashiwara-Vergne conjecture for quadratic Lie algebras, based on the equivariant Moser trick.
entry.arxiv:comment: To appear in C. R. Acad. Sci. Paris
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: C. R. Math. Acad. Sci. Paris 335 (2002), no. 9, 723--728.

entry.title: Virtual algebraic Lie theory: Tilting modules and Ringel duals for blob algebras
entry.summary: We construct a representation of the blob algebra over a ring allowing base change to every interesting (i.e. non--semisimple) specialisation which, in quasihereditary specialisations, passes to a full tilting module.

entry.title: Constructing homomorphisms between Verma modules
entry.summary: A practical method for constructing a nontrivial homomorphsim between Verma modules is described.
entry.arxiv:comment: 15 pages, added references, some comments on the affine case, an application concerning the construction of irreducible modules

entry.title: On the 2-modular reduction of the Steinberg representation of the symplectic group
entry.summary: We show that in characteristic 2, the Steinberg representation of the symplectic group Sp(2n,q), q a power of an odd prime p, has two irreducible constituents lying just above the socle that are isomorphic to the two Weil modules of degree (q^n-1)/2.

entry.title: Quivers of type A, flag varieties and representation theory
entry.summary: A short informal survey on the topics listed in the title. For the proceedings of the International Conference on Rings and Algebras X.
entry.arxiv:comment: 25 pages, corrected (and added) references, final version

entry.title: Parabolic character sheaves, I
entry.summary: We study a class of perverse sheaves on the variety of pairs (P,gU_P) where P runs through a conjugacy class of parabolics in a connected reductive group G and gU_P runs through G/U_P. This is a generalization of the theory of character sheaves.

entry.title: On some representations of the rational Cherednik algeba
entry.summary: We study lowest weight representations of the rational Cherednik algebra attached to a complex reflection group W. In particular, we generalize a number of previous results due to Berest, Etingof and Ginzburg.

entry.title: About a Theorem of Cline, Parshall and Scott
entry.summary: We give a simple proof of a Theorem of Cline, Parshall and Scott about the category O of BGG and suggest an analog for Harish-Chandra modules.
entry.arxiv:comment: 6 pages, LaTeX. Related material is available at http://www.iecn.u-nancy.fr/~gaillard

entry.title: Locally trivial principal homogeneous spaces and conjugacy theorems for Lie algebras
entry.summary: For g a split semisimple Lie algebra over a field of characteristic 0, we link locally trivial principal homogeneous spaces over Spec(R) to the question of conjugacy of maximal abelian diagonalizable subalgebras of g(R).
entry.arxiv:comment: 18 pages, to appear in Journal of Algebra

entry.title: Structure constants for Hecke and representation rings
entry.summary: We study the structure constants defining two related rings: the spherical Hecke algebra of a split connected reductive group over a non-Archimedean local field, and the representation ring of the Langlands dual group.

entry.title: A convexity property for real orbits in complexified Riemannian symmetric spaces
entry.summary: A convexity theorem for certain G-orbits in a complexified Riemannian symmetric space G_C/K_C is proved. Applications to analytically continued spherical functions will be given.

entry.title: Vector bundles, linear representations, and spectral problems
entry.summary: This paper is based on my talk at ICM on recent progress in a number of classical problems of linear algebra and representation theory, based on new approach, originated from geometry of stable bundles and geometric invariant theory.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Proceedings of the ICM, Beijing 2002, vol. 2, 599--614

entry.title: Purity of equivalued affine Springer fibers
entry.summary: The affine Springer fiber corresponding to a regular integral equivalued semisimple element admits a paving by vector bundles over Hessenberg varieties and hence its (Borel-Moore) homology is "pure".

entry.title: Regions in the dominant chamber and nilpotent orbits
entry.summary: We give a geometric description for the dominant characteristic of a nilpotent orbit in an arbitrary finite-dimensional rational G-module. In particular, we obtain a generalization of a recent result of Gunnells-Sommers, see math.RT/0212089.

entry.title: From double affine Hecke algebras to quantized affine Schur algebras
entry.summary: We prove that the double affine Hecke algebra of type A is Morita equivalent to the quantized affine Schur algebra.

entry.title: A(n,n)-graded Lie superalgebras
entry.summary: We determine the Lie superalgebras over fields of characteristic zero that are graded by the root system A(n,n) of the special linear Lie superalgebra psl(n+1,n+1).

entry.title: Correspondance de Langlands numerique pour la $\bar{\bf F}_p$-algebre de Hecke du pro-$p$-Iwahori de $GL_n(F)$
entry.summary: I withdraw this article because one of the references has changed in the meantime.

entry.title: Reflection Groups. A Contribution to the Handbook of Algebra
entry.summary: This is a survey article on the theory of finite complex reflection groups. No proofs are given but numerous references are included.

entry.title: On blocks with cyclic defect group and their head orders
entry.summary: It is shown that Section 8 of Plesken's 1983 lecture notes describes blocks of cyclic defect group up to Morita equivalence. In particular such a block is determined by its planar embedded Brauer tree. Applying the radical idealizer process, the head order of such blocks is calculated explicitly.

entry.title: Sur la structure transverse à une orbite nilpotente adjointe
entry.summary: We are interested in Poisson structures transverse to nilpotent adjoint orbits in a complex semi-simple Lie algebra, and we study their polynomial nature, introduced by R.Cushman and M.Roberts. Furthermore, in the case of sl(n), we construct some families of nilpotent orbits with quadratic transverse structures.

entry.title: Convolution of almost characters
entry.summary: In this paper we show that the convolution product of "almost characters" of a connected reductive group over a finite field is given by "structure constants" whose leading coefficients can be interpreted in K-theoretic terms and in particular are natural numbers.

entry.title: A geometric Jacquet functor
entry.summary: We describe the Jacquet module functor on Harish-Chandra modules via geometry.
entry.arxiv:comment: 10 pages; final version, to appear in Duke Math J

entry.title: Some Hodge theory from Lie algebras
entry.summary: We discuss Hodge-theoretic aspects, related to the loop Grassmannian, of the strong Macdonald conjecture (whose proof is joint work with Fishel and Grojnowski).
entry.arxiv:comment: Presented at the 1998 Irvine conference on Motives, Polylogarithms and Hodge theory. Posted as it is not widely available

entry.title: A remark on cuspidal local systems
entry.summary: In this note we show that all reductive groups are clean in odd characteristic. In characteristic 2 there are two cuspidal local systems (one for $F_4$ and one for $E_8$) which can not be handled by our method.

entry.title: On Isotropic Bessel Models for Principal Series Representations of $SO_{n,n+1}(\Bbb R)$
entry.summary: We show that principal series representations of the real split odd orthogonal group have non-vanishing rank one bessel models of a very particular type.

entry.title: A natural representation model for symmetric groups
entry.summary: For any positive integer $N$, we describe a natural complex representation of the symmetric group $\Sigma_N$ on the vector space spanned by its involutions that contains each irreducible representation exactly once.

entry.title: Littelmann paths and brownian paths
entry.summary: We study some path transformations related to Littelmann path model and their applications to representation theory and Brownian motion in a Weyl chamber.

entry.title: Invariant tubular neighborhood theorem for affine varieties
entry.summary: The aim of this note is to prove the algebraic geometry analogue of the Invariant tubular neighborhood theorem which concerns the actions of compact Lie groups on smooth manifolds.

entry.title: On the signature character of representations of p-adic general linear groups
entry.summary: In this article we calculate the signature character of certain Hermitian representations of $GL_N(F)$ for a $p$-adic field $F$. We further give a conjectural description for the signature character of unramified representations in terms of Kostka numbers.

entry.title: Sur le nombre de reflexions pleines dans les groupes de Coxeter finis
entry.summary: On etudie divers aspects d'une formule qui compte les reflexions pleines dans les groupes de Coxeter finis. ***** We study several points about a formula which counts reflexions in a finite Coxeter group whose reduced decompositions involve all simple reflexions.

entry.title: On unitary representations of groups of isometries
entry.summary: Is the topological group of all motions (including translations) of an infinite-dimensional Hilbert space $H$ isomorphic to a subgroup of the unitary group $U(H)$? This question was asked by Su Gao. We answer the question in the affirmative.

entry.title: On extensions and branching rules for modules close to completely splittable
entry.summary: New exact modular branching rules are obtained for modules over the symmetric groups that are close to completely splittable modules. These results are based on some upper bounds for the Ext^1-spaces between simple modules.

entry.title: Finite dimensional representations of double affine Hecke algebra of rank 1
entry.summary: We classify the finite dimensional representations of the double affine Hecke algebra of type $C^{\vee}C_1$ in the case when $q$ is not a root of 1.
entry.arxiv:comment: 8 pages, no figures; exposition is improved

entry.title: An algorithm for the computation of the decomposition matrices for Ariki-Koike algebras
entry.summary: We give a purely combinatorial algorithm for the computation of the decomposition matrices for Ariki-Koike algebras when the parameters are powers of the same root of unity. It generalizes the LLT algorithm.

entry.title: Modular representations of cyclotomic Hecke algebras of type G(r,p,n)
entry.summary: We give a classification of the simple modules for the cyclotomic Hecke algebras over $\mathbb{C}$ in the modular case. We use the unitriangular shape of the decomposition matrices of Ariki-Koike algebras and Clifford theory.

entry.title: Geometric Methods in Representation Theory
entry.summary: These myh lectures at the Park City conference in 1998.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Representation theory of Lie groups (Park City, UT, 1998), 241--290, IAS/Park City Math. Ser., 8, Amer. Math. Soc., Providence, RI, 2000

entry.title: Notes on Stein-Sahi representations and some problems of non $L^2$ harmonic analysis
entry.summary: We discuss one natural class of kernels on pseudo-Riemannian symmetric spaces.

entry.title: Horospherical model for holomorphic discrete series and horospherical Cauchy transform
entry.summary: We define a complex horospherical transform for affine symmetric spaces of Hermitian type and show that it has no kernel on the holomorphic discrete series.

entry.title: Jet modules
entry.summary: In this paper we classify indecomposable modules for the Lie algebra of vector fields on a torus that admit a compatible action of the algebra of functions. An important family of such modules is given by spaces of jets of tensor fields.

entry.title: Character sheaves on disconnected groups, VII
entry.summary: We define and study convolution of parabolic character sheaves. As an application we attach to any parabolic character sheaf the orbit of a tame local system on the maximal torus under a subgroup of the Weyl group.

entry.title: Cohomology of graded Lie algebras of maximal class
entry.summary: We compute the cohomology with trivial coefficients of two graded infinite-dimensional Lie algebras of maximal class, give explicit formulas for their representative cocycles. Also we discuss the relations with combinatorics and representation theory.

entry.title: Horospherical Cauchy-Radon transform on compact symmetric spaces
entry.summary: Harmonic analysis on noncompact Riemannian symmetric spaces is in a sense equivalent to the theory of the horospherical transform. There are no horospheres on compact symmetric spaces, but we define a complex version of horospherical transform which plays a similar role for the harmonic analysis on them.

entry.title: Complex horospherical transform on real sphere
entry.summary: We define a new integral transform on the real sphere which is invariant relative to the orthogonal group and similar to the horospherical Radon transform for the hyperbolic space. This transform involves complex geometry associated with the sphere.

entry.title: Canonical basic sets for Hecke algebras
entry.summary: We give an explicit description of the "canonical basic set'' for all Iwahori-Hecke algebras of finite Weyl groups in "good'' characteristic. We obtain a complete classification of simple modules for this type of algebras.

entry.title: Antimonotonous quadratic forms and partially ordered sets
entry.summary: Antimonotonous quadratic forms generalizing P-faithful posets defined by authors earlier are introduced. The criterion of antimonotonousness is given for posets with positive semidefinite quadratic forms. As consequence the new proofs of the criterions of finite representativity and tameness of posets are given.

entry.title: From triangulated categories to Lie algebras: A theorem of Peng and Xiao
entry.summary: We present a simplified and more intuitive proof of a theorem of Peng and Xiao, which constructs a Lie algebra from any 2-periodic triangulated k-category (satisfying some finiteness assumptions).

entry.title: Mackey Theory for $p$-adic Lie groups
entry.summary: This paper gives a $p$-adic analogue of the Mackey theory, which relates representations of a group of type $G=H\times_{t} A $ to systems of imprimitivity.

entry.title: Note on The Generalized Derivation Tower Theorem for Lie algebras
entry.summary: We provide an algorithm for decomposing a finite-dimensional Lie algebra over a field of characteristic 0 permitting to generalize the derivation tower theorem for Lie algebras, is proved by E. Schenkman \cite{Sc}.

entry.title: Normal forms of modules over admissible algebras with formal two-ray modules
entry.summary: The aim of the paper is to classify the indecomposable modules and describe the Auslander--Reiten sequences for admissible algebras with formal two-ray modules.

entry.title: Classification of the Irreducible Representations of Affine Hecke Algebras of Type B_2 with unequal parameters
entry.summary: We classify the finite dimensional irreducible representations of affine Hecke algebras of type B_2 with unequal parameters.

entry.title: Solvable Lie algebras, products by generators and some of its applications
entry.summary: In this work we generalize the concept of product by generators to the class of solvable Lie algebras. We analyze the number of invariants by the coadjoint representation by means of Maurer-Cartan equations and give some applications to product structures on Lie algebras.

entry.title: Twisted symplectic reflection algebras
entry.summary: In this paper we introduce the notion of twisted symplectic reflection algebras and describe the category of representations of such an algebra associated to a non-faithful G-action in terms of those for faithful actions of G.

entry.title: Induce/restrict matrices for exceptional Weyl groups
entry.summary: This manuscript contains tables giving the multiplicities with which irreducible characters of exceptional Weyl groups appear in characters induced from certain reflection subgroups containing maximal parabolic subgroups.

entry.title: Cluster algebras associated with extended Dynkin quivers
entry.summary: We show that the mutation class of a finite quiver without oriented cycles is finite if and only is the quiver is either Dynkin, extended Dynkin or has at most two vertices.

entry.title: The character sheaves on the group compactification
entry.summary: We give a definition of character sheaves on the group compactification which is equivalent to Lusztig's definition in \cite{L3}. We also prove some properties of the character sheaves on the group compactification.

entry.title: A geometric decomposition of Harish-Chandra modules
entry.summary: There are several serious errors in this paper. I thought to have time to fix it, but it did not occur for years. So I withdraw this paper.

entry.title: Separating Functions, Spectral Graph Theory and Locally Scalar Representations in Hilbert Spaces
entry.summary: In this article we consider the connection of separating finctions $\rho_r$ with locally scalar representations of graphs and with spectral graph theory.

entry.title: Invariant bilinear differential operators
entry.summary: I classified bilinear differential operators acting in the spaces of tensor fields on any real or complex manifold and invariant with respect to the diffeomorphisms in 1980. Here I give the details of the proof.

entry.title: Elementary divisors of Cartan matrices for symmetric groups
entry.summary: The purpose of this paper is to give a simple expression of the elementary divisors of the cartan matrices for the symmetric groups.

entry.title: From tilted to cluster-tilted algebras of Dynkin type
