entry.summary: We show how a cluster-tilted algebra of finite representation type is related to the corresponding tilted algebra, in the case of algebras defined over an algebraically closed field.

entry.title: Deformation Quantization on Singular Coadjoint Orbits
entry.summary: Invariant star products are constructed on minimal coadjoint orbits of all the simple Lie algebras. Explicit expressions are given for the generators of the Joseph ideals and the associated infinitesimal characters.

entry.title: Shapovalov determinants of Q-type Lie superalgebras
entry.summary: We define an analogue of Shapovalov forms for Q-type Lie superalgebras and factorize the corresponding Shapovalov determinants which are responsible for simplicity of highest weight modules. We apply the factorization to obtain a description of the centres of Q-type Lie superalgebras.

entry.title: Induced characters of the projective general linear group over a finite field
entry.summary: Using a general result of Lusztig, we find the decomposition into irreducibles of certain induced characters of the projective general linear group over a finite field of odd characteristic.

entry.title: Codimensions of root valuation strata
entry.summary: This paper defines and studies a stratification of the adjoint quotient of the Lie algebra of a reductive group over a Laurent power series field. The stratification arises naturally in the context of affine Springer fibers.

entry.title: On eigenvectors of nilpotent Lie algebras of linear operators
entry.summary: We give a condition ensuring that the operators in a nilpotent Lie algebra of linear operators on a finite dimensional vector space have a common eigenvector.

entry.title: A curious identity and the volume of the root spherical simplex
entry.summary: We show a curious identity on root systems which gives the evaluation of the volume of the spherical simpleces cut by the cone generated by simple roots.

entry.title: Multisymmetric syzygies
entry.summary: The content of this preprint together with additional material appears now in 0706.2154.
entry.arxiv:comment: The content of this preprint together with additional material appears now in 0706.2154

entry.title: K-finite matrix elements of irreducible Harish-Chandra modules are hypergeometric
entry.summary: We show that all the K-finite matrix elements of irreducible Harish-Chandra modules can can be expressed in spherical functions using finite number of operations

entry.title: Derived equivalences and finite dimensional algebras
entry.summary: We discuss the homological algebra of representation theory of finite dimensional algebras and finite groups. We present various methods for the construction and the study of equivalences of derived categories: local group theory, geometry and categorifications.
entry.arxiv:comment: Article for the Proceedings of ICM 2006 Madrid (31 pages)

entry.title: Coadjoint orbits of the group $UT(7,K)$
entry.summary: We present the classification of coadjoint orbits of the unitriangular group $UT(7, K)$. We also describe subregular orbits of $UT(n, K)$ for an arbitrary $n$.

entry.title: Maximal n-orthogonal modules for selfinjective algebras
entry.summary: Let A be a selfinjective algebra. We show that, for any n, maximal n-orthogonal A-modules (in the sense of Iyama), rarely exist. More precisely, we prove that if A admits a maximal n-orthogonal module, then all A-modules are of complexity at most 1.

entry.title: Double affine Hecke algebras at roots of unity
entry.summary: We study double affine Hecke algebras at roots of unity and their relations with deformed Hilbert schemes.

entry.title: Cohomology of line bundles on Schubert varieties in the Kac-Moody setting
entry.summary: In this paper we give top most and least indices of non vanishing cohomology modules of line bundles in the Kac Moody setting in terms of Weyl group combinatorics. We also prove a surjection Theorem.

entry.title: Character sheaves on certain spherical varieties
entry.summary: We study a class of perverse sheaves on some spherical varieties which include the strata of the De Concini-Procesi completion of a symmetric variety. This is a generalization of the theory of (parabolic) character sheaves.

entry.title: Algebraically rigid real solvable Lie algebras
entry.summary: We present all real solvable algebraically rigid Lie algebras of dimension $n\leq 8$. The difference between the classification of complex and real rigid Lie algebras is analyzed.

entry.title: Representation theory of Mantaci-Reutenauer algebras
entry.summary: We study some aspects of the representation theory of Mantaci-Reutenauer algebras: Cartan matrix, Loewy length, modular representations.
entry.arxiv:comment: 41 pages; the last question of the last section has been slightly modified

entry.title: Matrix Problems in Hilbert Spaces
entry.summary: We consider matrix problems in Hilbert spaces (orthoscalar representations of quivers and posets). A criterion of tameness of the problem of classification of indecomposable orthoscalar representations of a quiver is given.

entry.title: Periodicity of Y-systems and flat connections
entry.summary: We give a proof of the periodicity of Zamolodchikov's Y-systems in the AxA case using a novel interpretation of the system as a condition of flatness of a connection on a certain graph.
entry.arxiv:comment: 14 pages. References and minor misprints corrected

entry.title: Geometric structure in the representation theory of p-adic groups
entry.summary: We conjecture the existence of a simple geometric structure underlying questions of reducibility of parabolically induced representations of reductive p-adic groups.

entry.title: $H^*$-algebras and quantization of para-Hermitian spaces
entry.summary: In the present note we describe a family of $H^*$-algebra structures on the set $ L^2(X)$ of square integrable functions on a rank-one para-Hermitian symmetric space $X$.

entry.title: Domains of holomorphy for irreducible unitary representations of simple Lie groups
entry.summary: We classify the domains of holomorphy of all Harish-Chandra modules of irreducible unitary representations of simple non-compact Lie groups.
entry.arxiv:comment: revised version, to appear in Invent. math., 14 pages

entry.title: An algorithm for computing the canonical bases of higher-level q-deformed Fock spaces
entry.summary: We derive a straightening-free algorithm that computes the canonical bases of any higher-level q-deformed Fock space.
entry.arxiv:comment: Copy similar to the one published. Minor corrections since Version 1

entry.title: Quasihomogeneous $(C^*)^k \times SL_2(C)$-varieties containing a finite number of orbits
entry.summary: Let $G:= (C^*)^k\times SL_2(C)$ act linearly on a vector space or its projectivisation. We obtain an effective criterion to detect whether a number of orbits in an orbit-closure is finite or not.

entry.title: A realization of quantum groups via product valued quivers
entry.summary: Let U be the quantum group associated to a symmetrizable generalized Cartan matrix. We give a realization of U from the category of the representations of certain product valued quiver.

entry.title: Applications of Crystal Bases to Current Problems in Representation Theory
entry.summary: This dissertation addresses several current problems in Representation Theory using crystal bases. It incorporates the results of arXiv:math.QA/0408113 and arXiv:math.RT/0603547, as well as previously unpublished results.

entry.title: Counterexamples to Okounkov's Log-Concavity Conjecture
entry.summary: We give counterexamples to Okounkov's log-concavity conjecture for Littlewood-Richardson coefficients.
entry.arxiv:comment: Minor changes/corrections. Final version, to appear in Compositio Mathematica

entry.title: Alcove walks and nearby cycles on affine flag manifolds
entry.summary: Using Ram's theory of alcove walks, we give a proof of the Bernstein presentation of the affine Hecke algebra. The method works also in the case of unequal parameters. We also discuss how these results help in studying sheaves of nearby cycles on affine flag manifolds.

entry.title: On Regular Locally Scalar Representations of Graph $\widetilde{D}_4$ in Hilbert Spaces
entry.summary: We classify regular locally scalar (= orthoscalar) representations of graph $\widetilde{D}_4$ in Hilbert spaces

entry.title: Fundamental theorems for invariants of a class of pseudo-reflection groups
entry.summary: The content of this preprint together with additional material appears now in 0706.2154.
entry.arxiv:comment: The content of this preprint together with additional material appears now in 0706.2154

entry.title: Unipotent elements in small characteristic, II
entry.summary: Let G be a special orthogonal group over an algebraically closed field of characteristic exponent p. In this paper we extend certain aspects of the Dynkin-Kostant theory of unipotent elements in G (when p=1) to the general case (including p=2).

entry.title: Indecomposable representations for extended Dynkin quivers
entry.summary: We describe a method for an explicit determination of indecomposable preprojective and preinjective representations for extended Dynkin quivers by vector spaces and matrices. This method uses tilting theory and the explicit knowledge of indecomposable modules over the corresponding canonical algebra of domestic type.

entry.title: Multiplicity-free representations of the symmetric group
entry.summary: We determine all the multiplicity-free representations of the symmetric group. This project is motivated by a combinatorial problem involving systems of set-partitions with a specific pattern of intersection.

entry.title: Beurling's Theorem and $L^p-L^q$ Morgan's Theorem for Step Two Nilpotent Lie Groups
entry.summary: We prove Beurling's theorem and $L^p-L^q$ Morgan's theorem for step two nilpotent Lie groups

entry.title: Algorithims for Representation Theory of Real Groups (withdrawn)
entry.summary: This article has been replaced by arXiv:0807.3093

entry.title: The argument shift method and maximal commutative subalgebras of Poisson algebras
entry.summary: Let $S$ be the symmetric algebra of an algebraic Lie algebra. We provide a sufficient condition for the maximality of Poisson commutative subalgebras of $S$ obtained by the argument shift method.

entry.title: Irreducible representations of finite spin groups
entry.summary: We perform the computations necessary to establish a multiplicity one statement for the irreducible representations of a finite spin group which in turn yields the classification of irreducible representations of finite spin groups. (The multiplicity one statement was previously stated without proof.)

entry.title: Schur-Weyl dualities for symmetric inverse semigroups
entry.summary: We obtain Schur-Weyl dualities in which the algebras, acting on both sides, are semigroup algebras of various symmetric inverse semigroups and their deformations.

entry.title: The strong Lefschetz property of the coinvariant ring of the Coxeter group of type H4
entry.summary: We prove that the coinvariant ring of the irreducible Coxeter group of type H4 has the strong Lefschetz property.

entry.title: Corner view on the crown domain
entry.summary: In this paper I raise a question on the structure of the boundary of the crown domain.

entry.title: Zassenhaus conjecture for $A_{6}$
entry.summary: For the alternating group $A_{6}$ of degree 6, Zassenhaus' conjecture about rational conjugacy of torsion units in integral group rings is confirmed.
entry.arxiv:comment: 7 pages, Dedicated to the memory of I. S. Luthar

entry.title: The orders of torsion units in integral group rings of finite solvable groups
entry.summary: It is shown that for any torsion unit of augmentation one in the integral group ring $\mathbb{Z} G$ of a finite solvable group $G$, there is an element of $G$ of the same order.

entry.title: The product in the Hochschild cohomology ring of preprojective algebras of Dynkin quivers
entry.summary: In this paper, we compute the product structure of the Hochschild cohomology of preprojective algebras of quivers of type D and E over a field of characteristic zero.

entry.title: Generic character sheaves on disconnected groups and character values
entry.summary: We relate a generic character sheaf on a disconnected reductive group with a character of a representation of the rational points of the group over a finite field extending a result known in the connected case.

entry.title: A novel characterization of the Iwasawa decomposition of a simple Lie group
entry.summary: It is about the uniqueness of the Iwasawa decomposition.
entry.arxiv:comment: To appear in an appendix of a physics lecture notes volume

entry.title: Semisimple Algebraic Groups in Characteristic Zero
entry.summary: It is shown that the classification theorems for semisimple algebraic groups in characteristic zero can be derived quite simply and naturally from the corresponding theorems for Lie algebras by using a little of the theory of tensor categories. This article is extracted from Milne 2007.

entry.title: Radon transform on real symmetric varieties: kernel and cokernel
entry.summary: We define and study the (minimal) Radon transform on a real symmetric variety.

entry.title: The $(g,K)$-module structures of principal series representations of $Sp(3,R)$
entry.summary: We describe explicitly the whole structures of the $(g,K)$-modules of principal series representations of $Sp(3,R)$. We apply this result to determine the holonomic system characterizing those Whittaker functions.

entry.title: On the affineness of Deligne-Lusztig varieties
entry.summary: We prove that the Deligne-Lusztig variety associated to minimal length elements in any $\d$-conjugacy class of the Weyl group is affine, which was conjectured by Orlik and Rapoport in \cite{OR}.

entry.title: Note sur les invariants du groupe affine
entry.summary: In the paper, it is proved that any $C^{1}$-function on GL(n) which is locally $P$-invariant (here $P$ is the affine (sub)group of GL(n)) is locally $G$-invairant. There is also a statement for distributions (a very weak form of Baruch's results).

entry.title: Eigencone, saturation and Horn problems for symplectic and odd orthogonal groups
entry.summary: We consider the eigenvalue problem and the associated intersection theory of homogenous spaces for the symplectic and odd orthogonal groups. We solve the Horn and saturation problems for these classical groups.

entry.title: On the number of stable quiver representations over finite fields
entry.summary: We prove a new formula for the generating function of polynomials counting absolutely stable representations of quivers over finite fields. The case of irreducible representations is studied in more detail.

entry.title: Linear Algebraic Groups without the Normalizer Theorem
entry.summary: One can develop the basic structure theory of linear algebraic groups (the root system, Bruhat decomposition, etc.) in a way that bypasses several major steps in the standard development, including the self-normalizing property of Borel subgroups.

entry.title: Genericity of supercuspidal representations of p-adic Sp(4)
entry.summary: We describe the supercuspidal representations of Sp(4,F), for F a non-archimedean local field of residual characteristic different from 2, and determine which are generic.

entry.title: Twelve bridges from a reductive group to its Langlands dual
entry.summary: These notes are based on lectures given in Wuhan (China) in July 2007. Their aim is to provide an introduction to Langlands philosophy.

entry.title: On the endomorphism algebra of modular Gelfand-Graev representations
entry.summary: We study the endomorphism algebras of a modular Gelfand-Graev representation of a finite reductive group by investigating modular properties of homomorphisms constructed by Curtis and Curtis-Shoji.

entry.title: On derived equivalence classification of gentle two-cycle algebras
entry.summary: We classify, up to derived (equivalently, tilting-cotilting) equivalence all nondegenerate gentle two-cycle algebras. We also give a partial classification and formulate a conjecture in the degenerate case.

entry.title: Reflecting recollements
entry.summary: A recollement describes one triangulated category T as "glued together" from two others, S and U. The definition is not symmetrical in S and U, but this note shows how S and U can be interchanged when T has a Serre functor.

entry.title: Some algorithms for semi-invariants of quivers
entry.summary: We present some theorems and algorithms for calculating perpendicular categories and locally semi-simple decompositions. We implemented a computer program {\sc TETIVA} based on these algorithms and we offer this program for everybody's use.

entry.title: $G$-stable pieces and partial flag varieties
entry.summary: We will use the combinatorics of the $G$-stable pieces to describe the closure relation of the partition of partial flag varieties in \cite[section 4]{L3}.

entry.title: Study of a Z-form of the coordinate ring of a reductive group
entry.summary: We show how the theory of canonical bases in modified universal enveloping algebras can be used to develop the theory of Chevalley groups over any commutative ring with 1.

entry.title: On orbit closures for infinite type quivers
entry.summary: For the Kronecker quiver, Zwara has found an example of a representation whose orbit closure is neither unibranch nor Cohen-Macaulay. In this note, we explain how to extend this example to all infinite type quivers without oriented cycles.

entry.title: Combinatorial Gelfand Models
entry.summary: A combinatorial construction of a Gelafand model for the symmetric group and its Iwahori-Hecke algebra is presented.
entry.arxiv:comment: 15 pages, revised version, to appear in J. Algebra

entry.title: The Hall algebra of a cyclic quiver at $q=0$
entry.summary: We show that the generic Hall algebra of nilpotent representations of an oriented cycle specialised at $q=0$ is isomorphic to the generic extension monoid in the sense of Reineke. This continues the work of Reineke.

entry.title: Canonical form of m-by-2-by-2 matrices over a field of characteristic other than two
entry.summary: We give a canonical form of m-by-2-by-2 matrices for equivalence over any field of characteristic not two.

entry.title: Generalized Jacquet modules of parabolic induction
entry.summary: In this paper we study a generalization of the Jacquet module of a parabolic induction and construct a filtration on it. The successive quotient of the filtration is written by using the twisting functor.

entry.title: A slice theorem for quivers with an involution
entry.summary: We study the Luna slice theorem in the case of quivers with an involution or supermixed quivers as introduced by Zubkov. We construct an analogue to the notion of a local quiver setting. We use this technique to determine dimension vectors of simple supermixed representations.

entry.title: Support varieties of non-restricted modules over Lie algebras of reductive groups: corrigenda and addenda
entry.summary: This paper fixes a gap in my article "Support varieties of non-restricted modules over Lie algebras of reductive groups" pointed out to me by J.C. Jantzen. It was written several years ago, but never widely circulated.

entry.title: Representations for the non-graded Virasoro-like algebra
entry.summary: It is proved that an irreducible module over the non-graded Virasoro-like algebra, which satisfies a natural condition, is a GHW module or uniformly bounded. Furthermore, the classification of some uniformly bounded modules is given.

entry.title: Uniqueness and disjointness of Klyachko models
entry.summary: We show the uniqueness and disjointness of Klyachko models for GL(n,F) over a non-archimedean local field F. This completes, in particular, the study of Klyachko models on the unitary dual. Our local results imply a global rigidity property for the discrete automorphic spectrum.

entry.title: On the semi-regular module and vertex operator algebras
entry.summary: We prove a conjecture stated in a previous paper by the author about the existence of canonical filtrations for a family of vertex operator algebras in rational levels.

entry.title: Orbits of parabolic subgroups on metabelian ideals
entry.summary: We consider the action of a parabolic subgroup of the General Linear Group on a metabelian ideal. For those actions, we classify actions with finitely many orbits using methods from representation theory.

entry.title: On poles of twisted tensor L-functions
entry.summary: It is shown that the only possible pole of the twisted tensor L-functions in Re(s)\geq 1 is located at s=1 for all quadratic extensions of global fields.

entry.title: An Extension of the Classical Gauss Series-product Identity by Fermionic Construction of \hat{sl}_n
entry.summary: The main result of this paper is two infinity classes of series-product identities which is based on classical Gauss identity and two different interpretations of character formula for irreducible highest weight modules of affine Lie algebras.

entry.title: Orbit closures of directing modules are regular in codimension one
entry.summary: We show that the orbit closure of a directing module is regular in codimension one. In particular, this result gives information about a distinguished irreducible component of a module variety.

entry.title: Symplectic reflection algebras
entry.summary: We survey recent results on the representation theory of symplectic reflection algebras, focusing particularly on connections with symplectic quotient singularities and their resolutions, spaces of representations of quivers, and on category O.
entry.arxiv:comment: Submitted to the ICRA XII Book "Trends in Representation Theory of Algebras and Related Topics"

entry.title: On the existence of homomorphisms between principal series of complex semisimple Lie groups
entry.summary: We determine when there exists a nonzero homomorphism between principal series representations of a complex semisimple Lie group. We also determines the existence of homomorphisms between twisted Verma modules.

entry.title: Invariant tensors and graphs
entry.summary: We describe a correspondence between GL_n-invariant tensors and graphs, and show how this correspondence accomodates various types of symmetries and orientations.

entry.title: Simplified proof of the Theorem of Varopoulos in the commutative case
entry.summary: We give continuity properties of bitraces on (possibly non-commutative) Banach *-algebras based on the Closed Graph Theorem, leading to a simplified proof of the Theorem of Varopoulos in the commutative case.

entry.title: A remark on Frobenius characters for set representations of symmetric groups
entry.summary: For any set representation (permutation representation) of the symmetric group $S_n$, we give combinatorial interpretation for coefficients of its Frobenius character expanded in the basis of monomial symmetric functions.

entry.title: A Gelfand Model for Wreath Products
entry.summary: A Gelafand model for wreath products $\Z_r\wr S_n$ is constructed. The proof relies on a combinatorial interpretation of the characters of the model, extending a classical result of Frobenius and Schur.

entry.title: Structure of T modules and restricted duals: the classical and the quantum case
entry.summary: A concrete realization of Enright's $T$ modules is obtained. This is used to show their self-duality. As a consequence, the restricted duals of Verma modules are also identified.

entry.title: Moufang symmetry IV. Reductivity and hidden associativity
entry.summary: It is shown how integrability of the generalized Lie equations of a local analytic Moufang loop is related to the reductivity conditions and Sagle-Yamaguti identity.

entry.title: Moufang symmetry XII. Reductivity and hidden associativity of infinitesimal Moufang transformations
entry.summary: It is shown how integrability of the generalized Lie equations of continous Moufang transformatiosn is related to the reductivity conditions and Sagle-Yamaguti identity.

entry.title: Moufang symmetry V. Triple closure
entry.summary: Triple closure of the infinitesimal translations of an analytic Moufang loop is inquired. This property is equivalent to reductivity and relates Mal'tsev algebras to the Lie triple systems.

entry.title: Moufang symmetry VI. Reductivity and hidden associativity in Mal'tsev algebras
entry.summary: Reductivity in the Ma'tsev algebras is inquired. This property relates the Mal'tsev algebras to the general Lie triple systems.

entry.title: On types for unramified p-adic unitary groups
entry.summary: Folloing the methods of Bushnell-Kutzko for general linear groups, we construct simple types attached to certain skew simple strata for a symplectic group and an unramified unitary group over a non-archimedean local field.

entry.title: Automorphisms of wonderful varieties
entry.summary: Let G be a complex semisimple linear algebraic group, and X a wonderful G-variety. We determine the connected automorphism group of X and we calculate Luna's invariants of X under its action.
entry.arxiv:comment: 16 pages; added details and last section

entry.title: Moufang symmetry VII. Moufang transformations
entry.summary: Concept of a birepresentation for the Moufang loops is elaborated.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Trans. Inst. of Phys. Estonian Acad. Sci., Vol. 62 (1987), 142-158.

entry.title: Unitarizable minimal principal series of reductive groups
entry.summary: The aim of this paper is to give an exposition of recent progress on the determination of the unitarizable Langlands quotients of minimal principal series for reductive groups over the real or p-adic fields in characteristic 0.

entry.title: On regularity in codimension one of irreducible components of module varieties
entry.summary: Let A be a tame quasi-tilted algebra and d the dimension vector of an indecomposable A-module. In the paper we prove that each irreducible component of the variety of A-modules of dimension vector d is regular in codimension one.

entry.title: The Calogero-Moser partition for wreath products
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn - the results (with updated proofs) now appear in arXiv:0801.1627.
entry.arxiv:comment: This paper has been withdrawn - the results (with updated proofs) now appear in arXiv:0801.1627

entry.title: An Exceptional Representation of Sp(4,F_q)
entry.summary: We describe a folklore construction of an exceptional representation of Sp(4,F_q). This representation has the following remarkable combination of properties, namely it is cuspidal, degenerate and unipotent.

entry.title: On parahoric subgroups
entry.summary: We prove some basic facts on parahoric subgroups and on Iwahori-Weyl groups.
entry.arxiv:comment: 11 pages. Appendix to the paper "Twisted loop groups and their affine flag varieties", by G. Pappas and M. Rapoport; arXiv:math/0607130

entry.title: On the coordinate ring of spherical conjugacy classes
entry.summary: Let G be a simple algebraic group over an algebraically closed field of characteristic zero and X be a spherical conjugacy class of G. We determine the decomposition of the coordinate ring of X into simple G-modules.

entry.title: The character table of a split extension of the Heisenberg group $H_1(q)$ by $Sp(2,q)$, $q$ odd
entry.summary: In this paper we determine the full character table of a certain split extension $H_1(q)\rtimes Sp(2,q)$ of the Heisenberg group $H_1$ by the odd-characteristic symplectic group $Sp(2,q)$.

entry.title: On Kazhdan-Lusztig cells in type B
entry.summary: We prove that, for any choice of parameters, the Kazhdan-Lusztig cells of a Weyl group of type $B$ are unions of combinatorial cells (defined using the domino insertion algorithm).

entry.title: Asymptotic Harmonic Analysis on the Space of Square Complex Matrices
entry.summary: In this paper, we determine the spherical functions of positive type on the inductive limit space of square complex matrices.
entry.arxiv:comment: 22 pages. Submitted to Journal of Lie Theory

entry.title: On the unitarization of linear representations of primitive partially ordered sets
entry.summary: We describe all weights which are appropriated for the unitarization of linear representations of primitive partially ordered sets of finite type.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Operator Theory: Advances and Applications 190, (2008), pp. 279-294

entry.title: On Weyl resolutions associated to Frobenius twists
entry.summary: We construct Weyl resolutions associated to certain Frobenius twists of divided powers. Using these and other related complexes we obtain the Weyl filtration dimension of the Schur algebras S(2,r), a result due to A. Parker.

entry.title: Canonical tilting modules over shod algebras are regular in codimension one
entry.summary: We show that for a class of modules over shod algebras, including the canonical tilting modules, the closures of the corresponding orbits in module varieties are regular in codimension one.

entry.title: Algorithms for Representation Theory of Real Reductive Groups
entry.summary: We give an algorithm for computing the irreducible admissible representations of a real reductive group with regular integral infinitesimal character. This algorithm has been implemented on a computer, as part of the Atlas of Lie Groups and Representations project.

entry.title: Broue's Abelian Defect Group Conjecture for the Tits Group
entry.summary: In this paper we prove that Broue's abelian defect group conjecture holds for the Tits group $^2F_4(2)'$. Also we prove that under certain conditions we are able to lift derived equivalences and use this to prove Broue's conjecture for the group $^2F_4(2)$.

entry.title: The moduli space of 3-dimensional associative algebras
entry.summary: In this paper, we give a classification of the 3-dimensional associative algebras over the complex numbers, including a construction of the moduli space, using versal deformations to determine how the space is glued together.

entry.title: Factorization in generalized Calogero-Moser spaces
entry.summary: Using a recent construction of Bezrukavnikov and Etingof we prove that there is a factorization of the Etingof-Ginzburg sheaf on the generalized Calogero-Moser space associated to a complex reflection group. In the case W = S_n, this confirms a conjecture of Etingof and Ginzburg.

entry.title: The smooth representations of GL_2(O)
entry.summary: We present some unpublished results of Kutzko together with results of Hill, giving a classification of the smooth (complex) representations of $\mathrm{GL}_{2}(\mathcal{O})$, where $\mathcal{O}$ is the ring of integers in a local field with finite residue field.

entry.title: Rational representations of $GL_2$
entry.summary: Let $F$ be an algebraically closed field of characteristic $p$. We fashion an infinite dimensional basic algebra $\underleftarrow{\mathcal{C}}_p(F)$, with a transparent combinatorial structure, which we expect to control the rational representation theory of $GL_2(F)$.

entry.title: Decompositions of the tensor products of irreducible sl(2)-modules in characteristic 3
entry.summary: We completely describe the decompositions (into indecomposable submodules) of the tensor products of irreducible sl(2)-modules in characteristic 3. The answer resembles analogous decompositions for the Lie superalgebra sl(1|1).

entry.title: Cuspidal representations of reductive groups
entry.summary: This paper proves the existence of cuspidal automorphic forms for a reductive group, invariant under an automorphism of finite order. The techniques used are a local analysis of orbital integrals and the Arthur-Selberg trace formula.

entry.title: On infinitesimal Cherednik algebras of gl_2
entry.summary: We prove that the center of an infinitesimal Cherednik algebra of $\mf{gl}_2$ is the polynomial algebra of two variables over the field of characteristic 0. In positive characteristic we show that any infinitesimal Cherednik algebra is a finitely generated module over its center.

entry.title: Presentation of right-angled Soergel categories by generators and relations
entry.summary: Soergel bimodule category B is a categorification of the Hecke algebra of a Coxeter system (W,S). We find a presentation of B (as a tensor category) by generators and relations when W is a right-angled Coxeter group.

entry.title: Comparaison des paramètres de Langlands et des exposants à l'intérieur d'un paquet d'Arthur
entry.summary: In this paper, one proves an idea expressed by Clozel: inside an Arthur's packet, one has the representations in the Langlands' packet inside the Arthur's packet and more tempered representations than these representations

entry.title: Cyclotomic double affine Hecke algebras and affine parabolic category O, I
entry.summary: Using the orbifold KZ connection we construct a functor from an affine parabolic category O of type A to the category O of a cyclotomic rational double affine Hecke algebra. We give several results concerning this functor.

entry.title: The Hall algebra of a spherical object
entry.summary: We determine the Hall algebra, in the sense of Toen, of the algebraic triangulated category generated by a spherical object.
entry.arxiv:comment: references added, generalization to ground ring in section 3, 14 pages

entry.title: Cartan--Helgason theorem, Poisson transform, and Furstenberg--Satake compactifications
entry.summary: The connections between the objects mentioned in the title are used to give a short proof of the Cartan--Helgason theorem and a natural construction of the compactifications.

entry.title: Vertex representations for twisted affine Lie algebra of type A_{2l}^{(2)}
entry.summary: In this paper, we construct an irreducible vertex module for twisted affine Lie algebra of type A_{2l}^{(2)}.

entry.title: Perfectness of Kirillov-Reshetikhin crystals for nonexceptional types
entry.summary: For nonexceptional types, we prove a conjecture of Hatayama et al. about the prefectness of Kirillov-Reshetikhin crystals.

entry.title: The Derivation algebra and automorphism group of the generalized Ramond N=2 superconformal algebra
entry.summary: In this paper, we give the definition of the generalized Ramond N=2 superconformal algebras and discuss the derivation algebra and the automorphism group

entry.title: Multiplicities of the discrete series
entry.summary: The purpose of this paper is to show that the multiplicities of a discrete series representation relatively to a compact subgroup can be "computed" geometrically, in the way predicted by the "qantization commutes with reduction" principle of Guillemin-Sternberg.

entry.title: Holomorphic Extension of Eigenfunctions
entry.summary: Let X be a Riemannian symmetric space of non-compact type. We prove a theorem of holomorphic extension for eigenfunctions of the Laplace-Beltrami operator on X, by techniques from the theory of partial differential equations.

entry.title: The cluster complex of an hereditary artin algebra
entry.summary: We show that the cluster complex of an arbitrary hereditary artin algebra has the structure of an abstract simplicial polytope. In particular, the cluster-tilting objects form one equivalence class under mutation.

entry.title: On the Siegel-Weil Theorem for Loop Groups (I)
entry.summary: We proved a new Siegel-Weil formula for orthogonal and symplectic groups, which will be used later to prove a generalization of Siegel-Weil formula for loop groups.

entry.title: A limit transition from the Heckman-Opdam hypergeometric functions to the Whittaker functions associated with root systems
entry.summary: We prove that the radial part of the class one Whittaker function on a split semisimple Lie group can be obtained as an appropriate limit of the Heckman-Opdam hypergeometric function.

entry.title: Derived tame local and two-point algebras
entry.summary: We determine derived representation type of complete finitely generated local and two-point algebras over an algebraically closed field.

entry.title: Derived categories for algebras with radical square zero
entry.summary: We determine the derived representation types of algebras with radical square zero and give a description of the indecomposable objects in their bounded derived categories.

entry.title: Fusion Rings of Loop Group Representations
entry.summary: We compute the fusion rings of positive energy representations of the loop groups of the simple, simply connected Lie groups.

entry.title: Rational cohomology of an algebra need not be detected by Frobenius kernels
entry.summary: Friedrich Knop has given an example of a polynomial algebra A in characteristic two with an unusual SL_2 action. We exhibit a nontrivial class in H^1(SL_2,A), not detected by Frobenius kernels.

entry.title: Hassett-Tschinkel correspondence and automorphisms of the quadric
entry.summary: We study locally transitive actions of the commutative unipotent group $\Gan$ on a nondegenerate quadric in the projective space $\P^{n+1}$. It is shown that for each $n$ such an action is unique up to isomorphism.

entry.title: Diagram method in research on coadjoint orbits
entry.summary: We correspond to any factor algebra of the unitriangular Lie algebra with respect to a regular ideal some permutation. In terms of this permutation one can construct a diagram, that allows to calculate index and maximal dimension of coadjoint representation.

entry.title: The Bochner measure and holomorphic extension of elementary spherical functions
entry.summary: In this paper we determine the Bochner measure for spherical functions on a semi-simple Lie group of rank one.

entry.title: Degree 5 invariant of E8
entry.summary: We investigate a degree 5 invariant of groups of type E8 and give its applications to the structure of finite subgroups in algebraic groups.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Int. Math. Res. Not., article rnq018 (2010)

entry.title: Linear Koszul duality and affine Hecke algebras
entry.summary: In this paper we prove that the linear Koszul duality equivalence constructed in a previous paper provides a geometric realization of the Iwahori-Matsumoto involution of affine Hecke algebras.
entry.arxiv:comment: This paper has been withdrawn - superseded by arXiv:1301.4098

entry.title: Multiplicity preservation for orthogonal-symplectic and unitary dual pair correspondences
entry.summary: Over a non-archimedean local field of characteristic zero, we prove the multiplicity preservation for orthogonal-symplectic dual pair correspondences and unitary dual pair correspondences.

entry.title: A Class of Irreducible Modules for the Extended Affine Lie Algebra $\widetilde{\frak{gl}_l({\mathbb{C}_q})}$
entry.summary: We construct a class of modules for extended affine Lie algebra $\widetilde{\frak{gl}_l({\bc_q})}$ by using the free fields. A necessary and sufficient condition is given for those modules being irreducible.

entry.title: Asymptotyczna teoria reprezentacji grup permutacji (Asymptotic representation theory of symmetric groups)
entry.summary: This article (written in Polish) is aimed for a wide mathematical audience. It is intended as an introductory text concerning problems of the asymptotic theory of symmetric groups.

entry.title: On the $θ$-split side of the local relative trace formula
entry.summary: The author derives an expression for one side of the local relative trace formula, at the level of Lie algebras, by combining methods of Arthur and Harish-Chandra with the structure theory for reductive symmetric spaces.

entry.title: A q-Analogue of Kempf's vanishing theorem
entry.summary: We use deep properties of Kashiwara's crystal basis to show that the induction functor $ {H}^0 (-) $ introduced by Andersen, Polo and Wen satisfies an analogon of Kempf's vanishing Theorem.

entry.title: Duality for nonlinear simply laced groups
entry.summary: Let G be a nonlinear double cover of the real points of a connected reductive complex algebraic group with simply laced root system. We establish a uniform character multiplicity duality theory for the category of Harish-Chandra modules for G.

entry.title: Théorème de Paley-Wiener pour les fonctions de Whittaker sur un groupe réductif p-adique
entry.summary: We define the Fourier transform of compactly supported Whittaker functions on a reductive p-adic group and we characterize the image of this transformation.

entry.title: Quivers with relations of Harada algebras
entry.summary: For a finite dimensional algebra $R$, we give an explicit description of quivers with relations of block extension of $R$. As an application, we describe quivers with relations of Harada algebras by using those of the corresponding quasi-Frobenius algebras.

entry.title: Closed orbits of real reductive representations
entry.summary: We prove that the set of closed orbits in a real reductive representation contains a subset which is open with respect to the real Zariski topology if it has non-empty interior. In particular the set of closed orbits is dense.

entry.title: Graded cellular bases for the cyclotomic Khovanov-Lauda-Rouquier algebras of type A
entry.summary: This paper constructs an explicit homogeneous cellular basis for the cyclotomic Khovanov--Lauda--Rouquier algebras of type $A$.

entry.title: On rectangular Kronecker coefficients
entry.summary: We show that rectangular Kronecker coefficients stabilize when the lengths of the sides of the rectangle grow, and we give an explicit formula for the limit values in terms of invariants of $\fsl_n$.

entry.title: Uniqueness of Bessel models: the archimedean case
entry.summary: In the archimedean case, we prove uniqueness of Bessel models for general linear groups, unitary groups and orthogonal groups.

entry.title: From groups to symmetric spaces
entry.summary: In this paper we examine various properties/constructions which are known for reductive groups and we do some experiments to see to what extent they generalize to symmetric spaces.

entry.title: Geometric realization of PRV components and the Littlewood-Richardson cone
entry.summary: This is a companion paper to arXiv:0909.2280. It is mostly expository and focuses on the representation-theoretic and combinatorial aspects of the main problems considered in the other article.

entry.title: De GL(2,F) a Gal_{Q_p}
entry.summary: We construct a functor from the category of admissible finitely presented o-representations of GL(2,F) to the category of finite length o-representations of Gal_{Q_p}, for any finite extension F of Q_p and the ring of integers o of a finite extension L/Q_p.

entry.title: Complexity, Periodicity and One-Parameter Subgroups
entry.summary: We use the variety of one-parameter subgroups to define a numerical invariant for a representation of an infinitesimal group scheme. For an indecomposable module M of complexity 1, this number is related to the period of M.

entry.title: Finite dimensional representations of the rational Cherednik algebra for $G_4$
entry.summary: In this paper, we study representations of the rational Cherednik algebra associated to the complex reflection group $G_4$. In particular, we classify the irreducible finite dimensional representations and compute their characters.

entry.title: Les facteurs de transfert pour les groupes classiques: un formulaire
entry.summary: In the theory of endoscopy appears transfer factors. They were defined by Langlands and Shelstad in the ordinary case and by Kottwitz and Shelstad in the twisted case. The definition is abstract. For classical groups, we compute explicitely these factors.

entry.title: Une variante d'un résultat de Aizenbud, Gourevitch, Rallis et Schiffmann
entry.summary: Aizenbud, Gourevitch, Rallis and Schiffmann proves results of multicity one in different cases, in particular for orthogonal groups. Using the same method, we prove the same result for special orthogonal groups.

entry.title: Invariants of coadjoint representation of regular factors
entry.summary: A regular factor is a factor algebra of the unitriangular Lie algebra with respect to some regular ideal. In the paper we construct system of generators of the field of invariants for the coadjoint representation of an arbitrary regular factor.

entry.title: A Localization Theorem for Finite W-algebras
entry.summary: Following the work of Beilinson-Bernstein and Kashiwara-Rouquier, we give a geometric interpretation of certain categories of modules over the finite W-algebra. As an application we reprove the Skryabin equivalence.

entry.title: Reduction of spherical functions
entry.summary: Using reduction of spherical functions, we obtain generators of the algebra and the field of invariants for the coadjoint representation of Borel and maximal nilpotent subalgebras of simple Lie algebras.

entry.title: Finding a cluster-tilting object for a representation finite cluster-tilted algebra
entry.summary: We provide a technique to find a cluster-tilting object having a given cluster-tilted algebra as endomorphism ring in the finite type case.

entry.title: Orthogonal and symplectic bundles on curves and quiver representations
entry.summary: We show how quiver representations and their invariant theory natu- rally arise in the study of some moduli spaces parametrizing bundles dened on an algebraic curve, and how they lead to ne results regarding the geometry of these spaces.

entry.title: A generalisation of the category $\mathcal{O}$ of Bernstein-Bernstein-Gelfand
entry.summary: Given a reductive Lie algebra over the complex numbers, we introduce a family of category which generalises the BGG category $\mathcal{O}$. We also classify the simple modules for some of these categories and prove a semisimplicity result.

entry.title: The Gabriel-Roiter measures admitting no direct predecessors over $n$-Kronecker quivers
entry.summary: Let $Q$ be an $n$-Kronecker quiver, i.e., a quiver with two vertices, labeled by 1 and 2, and $n$ arrows from 2 to 1. We show that there are infinitely many Gabriel-Roiter measures admitting no direct predecessors.

entry.title: Generalized Verma Modules and Character Formulae for $\mathfrak{osp}(3|2m)$
entry.summary: The character formula of any finite dimensional irreducible module for Lie superalgebra $\mathfrak{osp}(3|2m)$ is obtained in terms of characters of generalized Verma modules.

entry.title: Partition Algebra, its Characterization and Representations
entry.summary: In this note we give representations for the partition algebra A_3(Q) in Young's seminormal form. For this purpose, we also give characterizations of A_n(Q) and$A_{n-1/2}(Q).

entry.title: Double Koszul Complex and Construction of Irreducible Representations of $\frak{gl}(3|1)$
entry.summary: The aim of this work is to give a combinatorial way to describe all irreducible representations in case the super-dimension of $V$ is $(3|1)$.
entry.arxiv:comment: 12 pages. To appear by Proc A.M.S

entry.title: The invariants of the binary decimic
entry.summary: We consider the algebra of invariants of binary forms of degree 10 with complex coefficients, construct a system of parameters with degrees 2, 4, 6, 6, 8, 9, 10, 14 and find the 106 basic invariants.

entry.title: Blocks of category $\mathcal{O}$ for rational Cherednik algebras and of cyclotomic Hecke algebras of type G(r,p,n)
entry.summary: We classify blocks of category $\mathcal{O}$ for rational Cherednik algebras and of cyclotomic Hecke algebras of type G(r,p,n) by using the "residue equivalence" for multi-partitions.

entry.title: Irreducible $SL_{n+1}$--Representations remain Indecomposable restricted to some Abelian Subalgebras
entry.summary: In this paper we show that any irreducible finite dimensional representation of $SL_{n+1}$ remains indecomposable if restricted to n--dimensional abelian subalgebras spanned by simple root vectors.

entry.title: A note on certain finite-dimensional representations of the braid group
entry.summary: In this paper the author finds explicitly all finite-dimensional irreducible representations of a series of finite permutation groups that are homomorphic images of Artin braid group.

entry.title: Dade's Invariant Conjecture for the Ree groups 2F4(q^2) in Defining Characteristic
entry.summary: We verify Dade's invariant conjecture for the simple Ree groups 2F4(2^{2n+1}) for all n > 0 in the defining characteristic, i.e., in characteristic 2. This completes the proof of Dade's conjecture for the simple Ree groups 2F4(2^{2n+1}).

entry.title: Generalized affine Springer fibers
entry.summary: This paper studies two new kinds of affine Springer fibers that are adapted to the root valuation strata of Goresky-Kottwitz-MacPherson. In addition it develops various linear versions of Katz's Hodge-Newton decomposition.

entry.title: Representation theory of rectangular finite $W$-algebras
entry.summary: We classify the finite dimensional irreducible representations of rectangular finite $W$-algebras, i.e., the finite $W$-algebras $U(\mathfrak{g}, e)$ where $\mathfrak{g}$ is a symplectic or orthogonal Lie algebra and $e \in \mathfrak{g}$ is a nilpotent element with Jordan blocks all the same size.

entry.title: Harish-Chandra modules over the $\Q$ Heisenberg-Virasoro Algebra
entry.summary: In this paper, it is proved that all irreducible Harish-Chandra modules over the $\Q$ Heisenberg-Virasoro algebra are of intermediate series (all weight spaces are 1-dimensional).

entry.title: Finite W-algebras
entry.summary: A finite W-algebra is an associative algebra constructed from a semisimple Lie algebra and its nilpotent element. In this survey we review recent developments in the representation theory of W-algebras. We emphasize various interactions between W-algebras and universal enveloping algebras.
entry.arxiv:comment: The text of a sectional talk for ICM 2010. 21 pages

entry.title: Complex Lie algebras corresponding to weighted projective lines
entry.summary: The aim of this paper is to give an alternative proof of Kac's theorem for weighted projective lines (\cite{W}) over the complex field. The geometric realization of complex Lie algebras arising from derived categories (\cite{XXZ}) is essentially used.

entry.title: Blocks of the category of cuspidal $\mathfrak{sp}_{2n}$-modules
entry.summary: We show that every block of the category of cuspidal generalized weight modules with finite dimensional generalized weight spaces over the Lie algebra sp(2n)(C) is equivalent to the category of finite dimensional C[[t_1,t_2,...,t_n]]-modules.

entry.title: A characterization of torsion theories in the cluster category of Dynkin type A_{\infty}
entry.summary: Let D be the cluster category of Dynkin type A_{\infty}. This paper provides a bijection between torsion theories in D and certain configurations of arcs connecting non-neighbouring integers.

entry.title: Graded decomposition matrices of v-Schur algebras via Jantzen filtration
entry.summary: We prove that certain parabolic Kazhdan-Lusztig polynomials calculate the graded decomposition matrices of v-Schur algebras given by the Jantzen filtration of Weyl modules, confirming a conjecture of Leclerc and Thibon.

entry.title: Irreducibility of some representations of the groups of symplectomorphisms and contactomorphisms
entry.summary: We show the irreducibility of some unitary representations of the group of symplectomorphisms and the group of contactomorphisms.

entry.title: Theta correspondences for GSp(4)
entry.summary: We explicitly determine the theta correspondences for $\GSp_4$ and orthogonal similitude groups associated to various quadratic spaces of rank $4$ and $6$. The results are needed in our proof of the local Langlands correspondence for $\GSp_4$.

entry.title: Spin representations of Weyl groups and the Springer correspondence
entry.summary: We give a common framework for the classification of projective spin irreducible representations of a Weyl group, modeled after the Springer correspondence for ordinary representations.
entry.arxiv:comment: 21 pages; v2: rewrote sections 3.3 and 3.4 on elliptic theory for W~

entry.title: Bruhat decomposition and applications
entry.summary: This is (the English translation of) a lecture given at a one day conference in memory of F. Bruhat held at the Institut Poincar\'e, Paris. We discuss the history and significance of the Bruhat decomposition of a reductive group.

entry.title: A Wakimoto type realization of toroidal $\mathfrak{sl}_{n+1}$
entry.summary: The authors construct a Wakimoto type realization of toroidal $\mathfrak{sl}_{n+1}$ The representation constructed in this paper utilizes non-commuting differential operators acting on the tensor product of two polynomial rings in many commuting variables.

entry.title: Operators Induced by Graphs
entry.summary: In this paper, we consider certain elements in von Neumann algebras generated by graph groupoids. In particular, we are interested in finitely supported elements, called graph operators. We study the characterizations for self-adjointness, the unitary property, hyponormality and normality of graph operators.

entry.title: Imprimitivity theorem for groupoid representations
entry.summary: We define and investigate the concept of the groupoid representation induced by a representation of the isotropy subgroupoid. Groupoids in question are locally compact transitive topological groupoids. We formulate and prove the imprimitivity theorem for such representations which is a generalization of the classical Mackey's theorem known from the theory of group representations.

entry.title: The Criterion of Completely Reducibility for Continuous Representations of Group Algebras
entry.summary: It is shown that every nonsingular continuous representation of the group algebra $L^{1}(G)$ in Banach spaces is completely reducible if and only if $G$ is a compact group.

entry.title: Modules with 1-dimensional socle and components of Lusztig quiver varieties in type A
entry.summary: We study modules with 1-dimensional socle for preprojective algebras for type A quivers. In particular, we classify such modules, determine all homomorphisms between them, and then explain how they may be used to describe the components of Lusztig quiver varieties.

entry.title: On geometric realizations of quantum modified algebras and their canonical bases, II
entry.summary: We prove part of the conjectures in [Li10a] (arXiv:1007.5384). We also relate the construction of quantum modified algebras in [Li10a] with the functorial construction in [ZH08](arXiv:0803.3668).

entry.title: Derived equivalence classification of symmetric algebras of polynomial growth
entry.summary: We complete the derived equivalence classification of all symmetric algebras of polynomial growth, by solving the subtle problem of distinguishing the standard and nonstandard nondomestic symmetric algebras of polynomial growth up to derived equivalence.

entry.title: Unitary representations of unimodular Lie groups in Bergman spaces
entry.summary: For an arbitrary unimodular Lie group $G$, we construct strongly continuous unitary representations in the Bergman space of a naturally constructed strongly pseudoconvex neighborhood of $G$ in the complexification of its underlying manifold.
